Branch As String = "" Public Dim ReviewingPOCEmail As String = "" Public Dim MDEPFunctionalEmail As String = "" Public Dim NotificationListEmails As String = "" Public Dim GeneralComments_Notes As String = "" Public Dim JUON As String = "" Public Dim ISR_Flag As String = "" Public Dim Cost_Model As String = "" Public Dim Combat_Loss As String = "" Public Dim Cost_Location As String = "" Public Dim Category_A_Code As String = "" Public Dim CBS_Code As String = "" Public Dim MIP_Proj_Code As String = "" Public Dim RequirementType As String = "" Public Dim DD_Priority As String = "" Public Dim Portfolio As String = "" Public Dim DD_Capability As String = "" Public Dim JNT_CAP_AREA As String = "" Public Dim TBM_COST_POOL As String = "" Public Dim TBM_TOWER As String = "" Public Dim APMSAITRNum As String = "" Public Dim ZERO_TRUST_CAPABILITY As String = "" Public Dim ASSOCIATED_DIRECTIVES As String = "" Public Dim CLOUD_INDICATOR As String = "" Public Dim STRAT_CYBERSEC_PGRM As String = "" Public Dim NOTES As String = "" Public Dim UNIT_OF_MEASURE As String = "" Public Dim FY1_ITEMS As String = "" Public Dim FY1_UNIT_COST As String = "" Public Dim FY2_ITEMS As String = "" Public Dim FY2_UNIT_COST As String = "" Public Dim FY3_ITEMS As String = "" Public Dim FY3_UNIT_COST As String = "" Public Dim FY4_ITEMS As String = "" Public Dim FY4_UNIT_COST As String = "" Public Dim FY5_ITEMS As String = "" Public Dim FY5_UNIT_COST As String = "" Public Dim SS_Priority As String = "" Public Dim Commitment_Group As String = "" Public Dim SS_Capability As String = "" Public Dim Strategic_BIN As String = "" Public Dim LIN As String = "" Public Dim FY1_QTY As String = "" Public Dim FY2_QTY As String = "" Public Dim FY3_QTY As String = "" Public Dim FY4_QTY As String = "" Public Dim FY5_QTY As String = "" Public Dim CommitmentItem As String = "" Public Dim sCType As String = "" Public Dim Status As String = "" Public Dim flow As String = "" 'Calculated Public Dim REQ_ID As String = "" 'Calculated Public Dim command As String = "" 'Calculated Public Dim scenario As String = "" 'Calculated
Public Dim valid As Boolean = True Public Dim validationError As String = ""
' Public Sub SetValidationError(ByVal valError As String) ' If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(validationError) Then ' validationError = "REQ " & title & " has errors. " & valError ' Else ' validationError = validationError & ", " & valError ' End If ' End Sub
Public Function StringOutput() As String Dim output As String = Me.command & "," & _ Me.Entity & "," & _ Me.FundCode & "," & _ Me.MDEP & "," & _ Me.APE9 & "," & _ Me.DollarType & "," & _ Me.Cycle & "," & _ Me.FY1 & "," & _ Me.FY2 & "," & _ Me.FY3 & "," & _ Me.FY4 & "," & _ Me.FY5 & "," & _ Me.Title & "," & _ Me.Description & "," & _ Me.Justification & "," & _ Me.ImpactifnotFunded & "," & _ Me.RiskifnotFunded & "," & _ Me.CostMethodology & "," & _ Me.CostGrowthJustification & "," & _ Me.MustFund & "," & _ Me.FundingSource & "," & _ Me.ArmyInitiative_Directive & "," & _ Me.CommandInitiative_Directive & "," & _ Me.Activity_Exercise & "," & _ Me.IT_CyberRequirement & "," & _ Me.UIC & "," & _ Me.FlexField1 & "," & _ Me.FlexField2 & "," & _ Me.FlexField3 & "," & _ Me.FlexField4 & "," & _ Me.FlexField5 & "," & _ Me.EmergingRequirement & "," & _ Me.CPATopic & "," & _ Me.PBRSubmission & "," & _ Me.UPLSubmission & "," & _ Me.ContractNumber & "," & _ Me.TaskOrderNumber & "," & _ Me.AwardTargetDate & "," & _ Me.POPExpirationDate & "," & _ Me.ContractorManYearEquiv_CME & "," & _ Me.COREmail & "," & _ Me.POCEmail & "," & _ Me.Directorate & "," & _ Me.Division & "," & _ Me.Branch & "," & _ Me.ReviewingPOCEmail & "," & _ Me.MDEPFunctionalEmail & "," & _ Me.NotificationListEmails & "," & _ Me.GeneralComments_Notes & "," & _ Me.JUON & "," & _ Me.ISR_Flag & "," & _ Me.Cost_Model & "," & _ Me.Combat_Loss & "," & _ Me.Cost_Location & "," & _ Me.Category_A_Code & "," & _ Me.CBS_Code & "," & _ Me.MIP_Proj_Code & "," & _ Me.RequirementType & "," & _ Me.DD_Priority & "," & _ Me.Portfolio & "," & _ Me.DD_Capability & "," & _ Me.JNT_CAP_AREA & "," & _ Me.TBM_COST_POOL & "," & _ Me.TBM_TOWER & "," & _ Me.APMSAITRNum & "," & _ Me.ZERO_TRUST_CAPABILITY & "," & _ Me.ASSOCIATED_DIRECTIVES & "," & _ Me.CLOUD_INDICATOR & "," & _ Me.STRAT_CYBERSEC_PGRM & "," & _ Me.NOTES & "," & _ Me.UNIT_OF_MEASURE & "," & _ Me.FY1_ITEMS & "," & _ Me.FY1_UNIT_COST & "," & _ Me.FY2_ITEMS & "," & _ Me.FY2_UNIT_COST & "," & _ Me.FY3_ITEMS & "," & _ Me.FY3_UNIT_COST & "," & _ Me.FY4_ITEMS & "," & _ Me.FY4_UNIT_COST & "," & _ Me.FY5_ITEMS & "," & _ Me.FY5_UNIT_COST & "," & _ Me.SS_Priority & "," & _ Me.Commitment_Group & "," & _ Me.SS_Capability & "," & _ Me.Strategic_BIN & "," & _ Me.LIN & "," & _ Me.FY1_QTY & "," & _ Me.FY2_QTY & "," & _ Me.FY3_QTY & "," & _ Me.FY4_QTY & "," & _ Me.FY5_QTY & "," & _ Me.flow & "," & _ Me.REQ_ID & "," & _ Me.scenario & "," & _ Me.validationError
Return output End Function End Class #End Region
End Namespace

file.name: CMD_PGM_Main_Calc.vb
file.sourceCode:
Imports System Imports System.Data Imports System.Data.Common Imports System.IO Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports System.Globalization Imports System.Linq Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports OneStream.Shared.Common Imports OneStream.Shared.Wcf Imports OneStream.Shared.Engine Imports OneStream.Shared.Database Imports OneStream.Stage.Engine Imports OneStream.Stage.Database Imports OneStream.Finance.Engine Imports OneStream.Finance.Database
Namespace OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.CMD_PGM_Main_Calc Public Class MainClass Public Function Main(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try
Select Case api.FunctionType
Case Is = FinanceFunctionType.CustomCalculate
#Region "RollFwdReq: Roll Forward Requirements" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("RollFwdReq") Then
Me.RollFwdReq(si,globals,api,args) Return Nothing End If #End Region
#Region "CalculateWeightedScoreAndRank" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("CalculateWeightedScoreAndRank") Then Me.CalculateWeightedScoreAndRank(si, globals,api,args) Return Nothing End If #End Region
#Region "ReapplyInflation" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("ReapplyInflation") Then Me.ReapplyInflation(si,globals,api,args) Return Nothing End If #End Region
#Region "CopyAmount" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("CopyAmount") Then Me.CopyAmount(si,globals,api,args) Return Nothing End If #End Region
#Region "CopyManpower" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("CopyManpower") Then Me.CopyManpower(si,globals,api,args) Return Nothing End If #End Region
#Region "CopyApprovedAmtADM" If args.CustomCalculateArgs.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("CopyApprovedAmtADM") Then Dim calScript As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs("calScript") 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"args calScript = " & calScript) api.Data.Calculate(calScript,True) End If #End Region
End Select
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
'END MAIN =================================================================================================
#Region "Constants" Public REQ_Member_Lists As New OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.REQ_Member_Lists.MainClass Private BR_REQDataSet As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardDataSet.REQ_DataSet.MainClass Private BR_REQ_String_Helper As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardStringFunction.REQ_String_Helper.MainClass #End Region
#Region "RollFwdReq: Roll Forward Requirements" '----------------------------- ' Purpose: Copy selected Current Year requiremnts to Next Year ' ' LOGIC OVERVIEW: ' - Get list of All requirements ' - Reduce list to only selected requirements(REQ_RollFwd_Status = yes) and in current data unit ' - loop thru list of requirements for accounts = REQ_Copy_List.base ' - copy annotations and amounts from source S#T# to target S#T# ' NOTE: data mgmt controls loop of data units you can write to so we loop through target and get data from source ' ' Usage: ' - From Data Mgmt: ' custom calculate Step --> Business Rule = REQ_Main_Calc & Function Name = RollFwdReq ' ' MODIFIED: ' <date> <user id> <JIRA ticket> <change description> ' 2024-03-26 AK RMW-1171 created ' 2024-09-04 AK RMW-15 modified copy to handle 5 years of annual data and a different account list = REQ_Copy_List --> REQ_Rollover_List ' '----------------------------- Public Function RollFwdReq(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Main_Calc" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "RollFwdReq"
Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sCurrScenario As String = api.Pov.Scenario.Name Dim iCurrScenarioYear As Integer = Strings.Right(sCurrScenario,4).XFConvertToInt Dim iPriorScenarioYear As Integer = iCurrScenarioYear - 1 Dim sPriorScenario As String = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrScenarioYear.ToString, iPriorScenarioYear.ToString)
Dim sCurrTime As String = api.Pov.Time.Name Dim iCurrTime As Integer = Strings.Left(sCurrTime,4).XFConvertToInt
Dim sSrcMbrScript As String = "" Dim sTgtMbrScript As String = ""
Dim sPOVEntity As String = api.Pov.Entity.Name 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sPOVEntity=" & sPOVEntity & " sCurrScenario=" & sCurrScenario & " sCurrTime=" & sCurrTime & " sPriorScenario=" & sPriorScenario & " iPriorScenarioYear=" & iPriorScenarioYear)
'------------------------------------- ' Get All Req E#F# List from prior year '------------------------------------- '!!!!! DVLP NOTE: need to tell GetAllREQList() to use prior scenario and prior year !!!!! args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("EntityMbrFilter", "E#" & sPOVEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("TimeOffset", "Prior") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#U1#U2#U3#U4#U5#U6#") Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQListRollover(si, globals, api, args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: lsReqAllList count=" & lsReqAllList.Count & " List =" & String.Join(", ", lsReqAllList))
If lsReqAllList.Count = 0 Then Return lsReqAllList
'!!!!! DVLP NOTE: reminder that you can only write to the open data unit at current POV Entity.Time ' therefore the data mgmt job needs to loop thru all enities that may exist in the REQ list
'------------------------------------- ' Reduce list to where roll status <> no and Entity equals POV Entity '------------------------------------- Dim lsRollFwdList As New List(Of String) For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsReqAllList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sRollFwdMbrScript=" & sRollFwdMbrScript) Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(1).Split("]")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(2).Split("]")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(3).Split("]")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(4).Split("]")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(5).Split("]")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(6).Split("]")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(7).Split("]")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Split("[")(8).Split("]")(0)
'----- only include REQ for the entity we are at ----- If Not sEntity.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(sPOVEntity) Then Continue For
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sEntity=" & sEntity & " sFlow=" & sFlow & " sU1=" & sU1 & " sU2=" & sU2 & " sU3=" & sU3 & " sU4=" & sU4 & " sU5=" & sU5 & " sU6=" & sU6)
'----- get rollfwd status ----- sSrcMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & iPriorScenarioYear.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Annotation:A#REQ_RollFwd_Status:I#None:F#" & sFlow & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim sRollFwdStatus As String = api.data.GetDataCellEx(sSrcMbrScript).DataCellAnnotation 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: SrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript & " sRollFwdStatus=" & sRollFwdStatus)
If Not sRollFwdStatus.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("no") Then
If lsRollFwdList.Count = 0 Then lsRollFwdList.Add("E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6) Else lsRollFwdList.Add(", E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6) End If
End If
Next 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: lsRollFwdList Count=" & lsRollFwdList.Count)
'----- exit if no requirements ----- If lsRollFwdList.Count = 0 Then Return lsRollFwdList
Select Case iCurrTime Case iCurrScenarioYear
'====================================================================================================== ' Copy Annotations '======================================================================================================
'------------------------------------- ' get list of accounts to copy in first year of current scenario '------------------------------------- Dim mbrAcctList As List(Of MemberInfo) = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si, "A_REQ_Main","A#REQ_Copy_List.base", True) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: Account List Count=" & mbrAcctList.Count)
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsRollFwdList Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0)
''+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 'Dim tStart As DateTime = Date.Now() ''+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
' '--------*********************** Clear********************---------------------------- ' Dim params As New Dictionary(Of String, String) ' params.Add("Entity", "E#" & sEntity) ' params.Add("Scenario", sCurrScenario) ' params.Add("Flow", sFlow) ' 'params.Add("Time", "T#2023,T#2024,T#2025,T#2026,T#2027,T#2028,T#2029")' & iCurrTime) ' params.Add("Time", "T#" & iCurrTime -1 & ",T#" & iCurrTime & ",T#" & iCurrTime + 1 & ",T#" & iCurrTime + 2 & ",T#" & iCurrTime + 3 & ",T#" & iCurrTime + 4 )' & iCurrTime)
' BRApi.Utilities.ExecuteDataMgmtSequence(si, "Delete_REQ", params)
'api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True)
' '-----------************************* End Clear****************************----------------- ''+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 'Dim tStop As DateTime = Date.Now() 'Dim tDuration As TimeSpan = tStop.Subtract(tStart) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"GetFilteredDataRows - Time = " & api.Pov.Time.Name & " Entity=" & api.Pov.Entity.Name & " Duration=" & tDuration.TotalSeconds.ToString("0.0000")) ''++++ 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq Copy: sCurrTime=" & sCurrTime & " sRollFwdMbrScript=" & sRollFwdMbrScript )
'--------- Copy Req annotations from PY to CY --------- For Each mbrAcct As memberInfo In mbrAcctList sSrcMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & iPriorScenarioYear.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Annotation:A#" & mbrAcct.Member.Name & ":I#None:F#" & sFlow & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim sAcctText As String = api.data.GetDataCellEx(sSrcMbrScript).DataCellAnnotation
sTgtMbrScript = sSrcMbrScript.Replace(iPriorScenarioYear.ToString, sCurrTime)
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: SrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript & " TgtMbrScript=" & sTgtMbrScript & " Text=" & sAcctText) api.Data.SetDataAttachmentText(sTgtMbrScript, sAcctText, False)
Next
'--------- manually set status ---------- sTgtMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sTgtMbrScript &= ":V#Annotation:A#REQ_Rqmt_Status:I#None:F#" & sFlow & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,dimtype.Scenario.Id,sCurrScenario) Dim wfTimeId As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,DimType.Time.Id,sCurrTime) Dim entityText3 As String = BRApi.Finance.Entity.Text(si, brapi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,DimType.Entity.Id,sEntity),3, wfScenarioTypeID, wfTimeId) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: TgtMbrScript=" & sTgtMbrScript) Dim sLevel As String = entityText3.substring(entitytext3.IndexOf("=") + 1,2)
api.Data.SetDataAttachmentText(sTgtMbrScript, sLevel & " Copied", False)
Next
'====================================================================================================== ' Copy Fundinglines '======================================================================================================
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsRollFwdList Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U1#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U2#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U3#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U4#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U5#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U6#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq Copy: sCurrTime=" & sCurrTime & " sRollFwdMbrScript=" & sRollFwdMbrScript )
'------------------------------------- ' Clear pre-existing amounts '------------------------------------- 'api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True)
'--------- get req funding lines --------- sSrcMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & iCurrTime.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow & ":I#" & sEntity & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None"
Dim dFundingLine As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sSrcMbrScript).CellAmount 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(Si,"sSrcMbrScript = " & sSrcMbrScript & ": funding=" & dFundingLine) 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(Si,"tgtmbrscript = " & sTgtMbrScript) '--------- set req funding lines --------- sTgtMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sTgtMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None" sTgtMbrScript &= ":I#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6
If dFundingLine <> 0 Then api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, dFundingLine, False, True)
Else api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, 0, True, True) End If
Next
'====================================================================================================== ' Copy Fundinglines that have no amounts in CY, CY+1, CY+2, CY+3, CY+4 '======================================================================================================
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsRollFwdList Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U1#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U2#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U3#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U4#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U5#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U6#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq Copy: sCurrTime=" & sCurrTime & " sRollFwdMbrScript=" & sRollFwdMbrScript )
' '--------- copy req amounts ---------
'----- check if an amount exist in any of the outer years ---- Dim sChkMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 0).ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sChkMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None" sChkMbrScript &= ":I#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 Dim dChkAmt0 As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sChkMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sChkMbrScript=" & sChkMbrScript & " dChkAmt = " & dChkAmt)
sChkMbrScript = sChkMbrScript.Replace(":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 0).ToString, ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 1).ToString) Dim dChkAmt1 As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sChkMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sChkMbrScript=" & sChkMbrScript & " dChkAmt = " & dChkAmt)
sChkMbrScript = sChkMbrScript.Replace(":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 1).ToString, ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 2).ToString) Dim dChkAmt2 As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sChkMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sChkMbrScript=" & sChkMbrScript & " dChkAmt = " & dChkAmt)
sChkMbrScript = sChkMbrScript.Replace(":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 2).ToString, ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear + 3).ToString) Dim dChkAmt3 As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sChkMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sChkMbrScript=" & sChkMbrScript & " dChkAmt = " & dChkAmt)
'--------- if no amounts in outer years then create a $1 funding line --------- If dChkAmt0 = 0 And dChkAmt1 = 0 And dChkAmt2 = 0 And dChkAmt3 = 0 Then sTgtMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sTgtMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None" sTgtMbrScript &= ":I#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6
api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, 1, False, True) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sTgtMbrScript=" & sTgtMbrScript & " missing funding line amount = 1") End If
Next Case iCurrScenarioYear - 1, iCurrScenarioYear + 1, iCurrScenarioYear + 2, iCurrScenarioYear + 3 '------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsRollFwdList Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U1#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U2#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U3#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U4#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U5#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U6#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0)
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & " POV Scenario=" & api.Pov.Scenario.Name & " POV Time=" & api.Pov.Time.Name & " POV Entity=" & api.Pov.Entity.Name)
'------------------------------------- ' Clear pre-existing amounts '------------------------------------- 'api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True)
'--------- get req funding lines --------- sSrcMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & iCurrTime.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity
sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow & ":I#" & sEntity & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None" 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "qsSrcMbrScript " & sSrcMbrScript) Dim dFundingLine As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sSrcMbrScript).CellAmount
'--------- set req funding lines --------- sTgtMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sTgtMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None" sTgtMbrScript &= ":I#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "qREQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sTgtMbrScript=" & sTgtMbrScript & " amount = " & dFundingLine)
If dFundingLine <> 0 Then api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, dFundingLine, False, True)
Else api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, 0, True, True) End If
Next Case iCurrScenarioYear+4
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sRollFwdMbrScript As String In lsRollFwdList Dim sEntity As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U1#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U2#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U3#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U4#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U5#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sRollFwdMbrScript.Replace("U6#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0)
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq Copy: E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & " POV Scenario=" & api.Pov.Scenario.Name & " POV Time=" & api.Pov.Time.Name & " POV Entity=" & api.Pov.Entity.Name & " Cons=" & api.Pov.Cons.Name )
'------------------------------------- ' Clear pre-existing amounts '------------------------------------- 'api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True)
'--------- get req funding lines --------- sSrcMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear+3).ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow & ":I#" & sEntity & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None"
Dim dFundingLine As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sSrcMbrScript).CellAmount
'--------- get inflation rate --------- Dim sAPPN As String = "" If sU1.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("none") Then sAPPN = "None" Else sAPPN = api.Members.GetParents(BRApi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si, "U1_APPN_FUND"), api.Members.GetMemberId(dimtypeid.UD1, sU1), True )(0).Name & "_General" End If Dim sInfRateScript As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & iCurrScenarioYear.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sCube & "_General:V#Periodic:A#PGM_Inflation_Rate_Amt:O#BeforeAdj:I#None:F#None" sInfRateScript &= ":U1#" & sAPPN & ":U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim dInflationRate As Decimal = 0 Try dInflationRate =api.data.GetDataCellEx(sInfRateScript).DataCell.CellAmount
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "RollFwdReq: Invalid Inflation Rate Member Script. sInfRateScript=" & sInfRateScript) End Try 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sInfRateScript=" & sInfRateScript & " dInflationRate=" & dInflationRate)
'--------- set req funding lines --------- sTgtMbrScript = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & sCurrTime & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sTgtMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None" sTgtMbrScript &= ":I#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6
dFundingLine = Math.Round(dFundingLine * (1 + (dInflationRate/100))) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQ_Main_Calc.RollFwdReq: sTgtMbrScript=" & sTgtMbrScript & " amount = " & dFundingLine & " dInflationRate = " & dInflationRate) If dFundingLine <> 0 Then api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, dFundingLine, False, True) Else api.Data.SetDataCell(sTgtMbrScript, 0, True, True) End If
Next
End Select
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "CalculateWeightedScoreAndRank" 'Update EH 090324 RMW-1565 Changed REQTime to annual for centralized text update Private Function CalculateWeightedScoreAndRank(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim WFCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim WFScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim WFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim REQTime As String = WFYear Dim sInternalRank As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("InternalRank") Dim sFundCenter As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FundCenter")
'Get cat and weight Dim priCatNameAndWeight As Dictionary(Of String, Decimal) = New Dictionary(Of String, Decimal) priCatNameAndWeight = Me.GetCategoryAndWeight(si, args)
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "REQList = " & REQList.Count) Dim catScoreMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#EEEE" & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Cat_Name:F#FFFF:O#BeforeAdj:I#" & sFundCenter & ":U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#UUUU:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim REQScores As List(Of REQ_Score) = New List(Of REQ_Score) ' For Each REQ As String In REQList Dim dt As DataTable = BRApi.Utilities.GetSessionDataTable(si,si.UserName,"REQListCVResult")
'Loops For Each row As DataRow In dt.Rows Dim cleanREQ_Entity = row("EntityFlow").Split(":")(0).Replace("e#[","").Replace("]","") Dim cleanREQ_Id = row("EntityFlow").Split(":")(1).Replace("f#[","").Replace("]","") ' Dim cleanREQ_Id As String = REQ.Substring(REQ.IndexOf("f#[") + 3, 6) Dim REQInfo As REQ_Score = New REQ_Score REQInfo.REQ_Id = cleanREQ_Id ' Dim cleanREQ_Entity As String = REQ.Split(":"c)(0).Split("["c)(1).Trim("]"c) REQInfo.REQ_Entity = cleanREQ_Entity REQInfo.scores = New Dictionary(Of String, Decimal)
For Each kp As KeyValuePair(Of String, Decimal) In priCatNameAndWeight 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, wfProfileName) 'replace key for EEEE, UUUU and FFFF and get score. Also get the weight from the key and calculate the total Weighted score Dim priCatScore As Decimal = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, WFCube, catScoreMemScript.Replace("EEEE",cleanREQ_Entity ).Replace("UUUU",kp.Key).Replace("FFFF",cleanREQ_Id)).DataCellEx.DataCell.CellAmount 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "pricatScore = " & pricatScore) If (priCatScore > 0) Then REQInfo.scores.Add(kp.Key, priCatScore) REQInfo.totalWeightedScore += priCatScore * (kp.Value/100) End If Next
'Add the REQ class to the list REQScores.Add(REQInfo) Next 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "Here") 'Sort the REQs REQScores = REQScores.OrderByDescending(Function(u) u.totalWeightedScore).ToList
'Update the REQ with the calculated weight
Dim rank As Integer = 0 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "sFundcenter = " & sFundCenter) For Each REQScore As REQ_Score In REQScores Dim SaveTotalScoreMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & REQScore.REQ_Entity & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Score:F#FFFF:O#BeforeAdj:I#" &sFundCenter & ":U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim SaveRankMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & REQScore.REQ_Entity & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Calc_Rank:F#FFFF:O#BeforeAdj:I#" &sFundCenter & ":U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim SaveOverrideMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & REQScore.REQ_Entity & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Override_Rank:F#FFFF:O#BeforeAdj:I#" &sFundCenter & ":U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim SaveInternalRankMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & REQScore.REQ_Entity & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Internal_Rank:F#FFFF:O#BeforeAdj:I#" &sFundCenter & ":U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
'Update REQ Status to Prioritize Dim REQStatusMemberScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & REQScore.REQ_Entity & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Annotation:A#REQ_Rqmt_Status:F#" & REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper() & ":O#BeforeAdj:I#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim REQStatus As String = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, WFCube, REQStatusMemberScript).DataCellEx.DataCellAnnotation Dim CurrentLevel As String = REQStatus.Substring(0,2) Dim NewStatus As String = CurrentLevel & " Prioritized"
Dim objListofScriptsWFStatus As New List(Of MemberScriptandValue) Dim objScriptValWFStatus As New MemberScriptAndValue objScriptValWFStatus.CubeName = WFCube objScriptValWFStatus.Script = REQStatusMemberScript objScriptValWFStatus.TextValue = NewStatus objScriptValWFStatus.IsNoData = False objListofScriptsWFStatus.Add(objScriptValWFStatus)
BRApi.Finance.Data.SetDataCellsUsingMemberScript(si, objListofScriptsWFStatus)
rank = rank + 1
Dim objListofScriptsTotalScore As New List(Of MemberScriptandValue) Dim objScriptValTotalScore As New MemberScriptAndValue objScriptValTotalScore.CubeName = WFCube objScriptValTotalScore.Script = SaveTotalScoreMemScript.Replace("FFFF", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) objScriptValTotalScore.Amount = REQScore.totalWeightedScore objScriptValTotalScore.IsNoData = False objListofScriptsTotalScore.Add(objScriptValTotalScore)
BRApi.Finance.Data.SetDataCellsUsingMemberScript(si, objListofScriptsTotalScore)
Dim objListofScriptsRank As New List(Of MemberScriptandValue) Dim objScriptValRank As New MemberScriptAndValue objScriptValRank.CubeName = WFCube objScriptValRank.Script = SaveRankMemScript.Replace("FFFF", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) objScriptValRank.Amount = rank objScriptValRank.IsNoData = False objListofScriptsRank.Add(objScriptValRank)
BRApi.Finance.Data.SetDataCellsUsingMemberScript(si, objListofScriptsRank)
Dim objListofScriptsOverride As New List(Of MemberScriptandValue) Dim objScriptValOverride As New MemberScriptAndValue objScriptValOverride.CubeName = WFCube objScriptValOverride.Script = SaveOverrideMemScript.Replace("FFFF", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) objScriptValOverride.Amount = rank objScriptValOverride.IsNoData = False objListofScriptsOverride.Add(objScriptValOverride)
BRApi.Finance.Data.SetDataCellsUsingMemberScript(si, objListofScriptsOverride)
If sInternalRank.XFContainsIgnoreCase("True") Then
Dim objListofScriptsInternal As New List(Of MemberScriptandValue) Dim objScriptValInternal As New MemberScriptAndValue objScriptValInternal.CubeName = WFCube objScriptValInternal.Script = SaveInternalRankMemScript.Replace("FFFF", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) objScriptValInternal.Amount = rank objScriptValInternal.IsNoData = False objListofScriptsInternal.Add(objScriptValInternal)
BRApi.Finance.Data.SetDataCellsUsingMemberScript(si, objListofScriptsInternal) End If 'set last updated name and date, and update status history Dim BR_REQ_SolutionHelper As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardExtender.REQ_SolutionHelper.MainClass Dim deArgs As New DashboardExtenderArgs deArgs.FunctionType = DashboardExtenderFunctionType.ComponentSelectionChanged deArgs.FunctionName = "LastUpdated" deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("updatedREQEntity", REQScore.REQ_Entity) deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("updatedREQFlow", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) BR_REQ_SolutionHelper.Main(si, globals, api, deArgs)
deArgs.FunctionType = DashboardExtenderFunctionType.ComponentSelectionChanged deArgs.FunctionName = "UpdateStatusHistory" deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ufrEntity", REQScore.REQ_Entity) deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ufrFlow", REQScore.REQ_Id.ToUpper()) deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("FundCenter", sFundCenter) deArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("status", NewStatus) BR_REQ_SolutionHelper.Main(si, globals, api, deArgs)
Next
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
'Created 10/15/2023 - YH 'This rule gets the catogery And weight that are configured for a given fund center 'Update EH 090324 RMW-1565 Changed REQTime to annual for centralized text update Private Function GetCategoryAndWeight(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try 'Get the list of catagories Dim WFCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim WFScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim WFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim REQTime As String = WFYear
Dim sFundCenter As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FundCenter") 'Brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"entity = " & REQEntity) Dim priCatMembers As List(Of MemberInfo) Dim priFilter As String = "U5#UFR_Priority_Category.Children" Dim priCatDimPk As DimPk = BRApi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si, "U5_Main") priCatMembers = BRApi.Finance.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(si, priCatDimPk, priFilter, True)
Dim catNameMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & sFundCenter & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Annotation:A#REQ_Priority_Cat_Name:F#None:O#BeforeAdj:I#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#UUUU:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim catWeightMemScript As String = "Cb#" & WFCube & ":E#" & sFundCenter & ":C#Local:S#" & WFScenario & ":T#" & REQTime & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Cat_Weight:F#None:O#BeforeAdj:I#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#UUUU:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim priCatName As String = "" Dim priCatWeight As Decimal
Dim priCatNameAndWeight As Dictionary(Of String, Decimal) = New Dictionary(Of String, Decimal) For Each pricat As MemberInfo In priCatMembers priCatName = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, WFCube, catNameMemScript.Replace("UUUU",priCat.Member.Name)).DataCellEx.DataCellAnnotation 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "priCatName = " & priCatName) If (Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(priCatName)) Then priCatWeight = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, WFCube, catWeightMemScript.Replace("UUUU",priCat.Member.Name)).DataCellEx.DataCell.CellAmount 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "priCatWeight = " & priCatWeight) priCatNameAndWeight.Add(priCat.Member.Name, priCatWeight) End If Next
Return priCatNameAndWeight
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region
#Region "ReapplyInflation" Public Function ReapplyInflation(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try
'========== routine vars ============================================================================================================ Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim iCurrScenarioYear As Integer = Strings.Right(wfScenarioName,4).XFConvertToInt Dim scbxEntity As String= args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Entity") Dim sFinalEntity As String = scbxEntity.Replace("_General","") Dim sSrcMbrScript As String = "" Dim sSrcMbrScriptFilter As String = "" Dim sTgtMbrScript As String = ""
'------------------------------------- ' Get All Req E#F# List '------------------------------------- args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("EntityMbrFilter", sFinalEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("TitleSearch","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Mode", "Current")
Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQListReapplyInflation(si, globals, api, args)
If lsReqAllList.Count = 0 Then Return lsReqAllList
'Reduce list to Entity equals cbx Entity Dim lsreapplylist As New List(Of String) For Each sreapplyMbrScript As String In lsReqAllList
Dim sEntity As String = sreapplyMbrScript.Split("[")(1).Split("]")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sreapplyMbrScript.Split("[")(2).Split("]")(0)
'----- only include REQ for the entity we are at ----- If Not sEntity.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(sFinalEntity) Then Continue For
'--------- Filter out REQs at L1 and L2 Status --------- sSrcMbrScriptFilter = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear).ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScriptFilter &= ":V#Annotation:A#REQ_Rqmt_Status:F#" & sFlow & ":O#BeforeAdj:I#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#ReadOnlyAnnotation"
Dim sFilterStatus As String = api.data.GetDataCellEx(sSrcMbrScriptFilter).DataCellAnnotation
If sFilterStatus.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L1") Or sFilterStatus.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L2") Then Continue For
If lsreapplylist.Count = 0 Then lsreapplylist.Add("E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow) Else lsreapplylist.Add(", E#" & sEntity & ":F#" & sFlow) End If
Next
'----- exit if no requirements ----- If lsreapplylist.Count = 0 Then Return lsreapplylist
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs within data unit '------------------------------------- For Each sreapplyMbrScript As String In lsreapplylist Dim sEntity As String = sreapplyMbrScript.Replace("E#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sreapplyMbrScript.Replace("F#", "~").Split("~")(1).Split(":")(0)
'------------------------------------- ' Clear pre-existing amounts '------------------------------------- 'api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sCurrScenario & ":T#" & & (iCurrScenarioYear+4).ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True)
'--------- copy req amounts --------- sSrcMbrScript = "RemoveZeros(Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear+3).ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow & ":O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None)"
Dim dbFundingLines As DataBuffer = Nothing Try dbFundingLines = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sSrcMbrScript,,False)
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Reapply Inflation: Invalid Soure Requested Amount Member Script. sSrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript) End Try
For Each dcCell As DataBufferCell In dbFundingLines.DataBufferCells.values Dim sIC As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetICName(api) Dim sU1 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD1Name(api) Dim sU2 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD2Name(api) Dim sU3 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD3Name(api) Dim sU4 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD4Name(api) Dim sU5 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD5Name(api) Dim sU6 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD6Name(api)
Dim sAPPN As String = "" If sU1.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("none") Then sAPPN = "None" Else sAPPN = api.Members.GetParents(BRApi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si, "U1_APPN_FUND"), api.Members.GetMemberId(dimtypeid.UD1, sU1), True )(0).Name & "_General" End If Dim sInfRateScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iCurrScenarioYear.ToString & ":C#USD:E#" & wfCube & "_General:V#Periodic:A#PGM_Inflation_Rate_Amt:O#BeforeAdj:I#None:F#None" sInfRateScript &= ":U1#" & sAPPN & ":U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim dInflationRate As Decimal = 0 Try dInflationRate =api.data.GetDataCellEx(sInfRateScript).DataCell.CellAmount
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Reapply Inflation: Invalid Inflation Rate Member Script. sInfRateScript=" & sInfRateScript) End Try
Dim dAmt As Decimal = Math.Round(dcCell.CellAmount * (1 + (dInflationRate/100)))
Dim sTgtMbrScriptForm As String = "Cb#" &wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & (iCurrScenarioYear+4).ToString & ":C#Local:E#" & sEntity & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None"& ":I#" & sIC & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6
Dim targetCell As DataCell Dim targetCellInfo As DataCellInfoUsingMemberScript targetCellInfo = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, wfCube, sTgtMbrScriptForm) targetCell = targetCellInfo.DataCellEx.DataCell
'Only write Labor Cost to cube if NOT manually inputted by user. If (targetCell.CellStatus.StorageType.ToString <> "Input" Or targetCell.CellStatus.IsRealData <> "True") Then api.Data.SetDataCell(api.Data.GetDataCell(targetCell.DataCellPk).DataCellPk.CreateMemberScriptBuilder(api).GetMemberScript, dAmt, False, True) End If Next Next
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "CopyAmount" Public Function CopyAmount(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try
Dim account As String = "REQ_Requested_Amt" Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim FY As String = api.Pov.Time.Name Dim trgtEntity As String = api.Pov.Entity.Name Dim trgtScenario As String = api.Pov.Scenario.Name Dim trgtFlow As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("trgtFlow") Dim sSrcMbrScript As String = "" Dim srcEntity As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("srcEntity") Dim srcFlow As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("srcFlow") Dim srcSenario As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("srcSenario") Dim trgtScript As String = "" Dim srcScript As String = "E#" & srcEntity & ":S#" & srcSenario & ":T#" & FY & ":F#" & srcFlow & ":I#" & srcEntity & ":A#" & account trgtScript = "E#" & trgtEntity & ":S#" & trgtScenario & ":T#" & FY & ":F#" & trgtFlow & ":I#" & trgtEntity & ":A#" & account Dim calScript As String = trgtScript & " = " & srcScript
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"trgtScript = " & trgtScript)
api.Data.ClearCalculatedData(trgtScript, True, True, True, True)
api.Data.Calculate(calScript,True)
Return Nothing
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "CopyManpower" 'Updated 12/03/2024 by Fronz - changed BO5 to BOC & added the 'Clear Existing Data' lines of code Public Function CopyManpower(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try Dim sFlow As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("REQ") Dim sEntityGeneral As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Entity") Dim sSourcePosition As String = args.CustomCalculateArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("SourcePB") Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sTargetScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim sTargetFirstYear As String = sTargetScenario.Trim.Substring(sTargetScenario.Length-4) Dim sTargetYear As String = api.Pov.Time.Name Dim sSrcMbrScript As String = ""
Dim sBOCSourceMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":C#Local:E#" & sCube & ":V#Periodic:A#BOC:O#BeforeAdj:U7#Top:U8#Top:I#Top:F#Baseline:U1#Top:U2#Top:U3#Top:U4#Top:U5#Top:U6#Top" Dim BOCSourceCell As String = api.Data.GetDataCellEx(sBOCSourceMbrScript).DataCell.CellAmount Dim sBO6SourceMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":C#Local:E#" & sCube & ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:O#BeforeAdj:U7#Top:U8#Top:I#Top:F#Baseline:U1#Top:U2#Top:U3#Top:U4#Top:U5#Top:U6#Top" Dim BO6SourceCell As String = api.Data.GetDataCellEx(sBO6SourceMbrScript).DataCell.CellAmount 'Clear existing data api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sTargetScenario & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True) api.Data.ClearCalculatedData("Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sTargetScenario & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:F#" & sFlow, True, True, True, True) '--Copy overlapping years for BO6 data-- If Not BO6SourceCell.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(0) Then sSrcMbrScript = "RemoveZeros(Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":C#Local:E#" & sCube sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:I#Top:U7#Top:U8#Top)"
Dim dbFundingLines As DataBuffer = Nothing Try dbFundingLines = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sSrcMbrScript,,False)
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Import Manpower: Invalid Source Member Script. sSrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript) End Try For Each dcCell As DataBufferCell In dbFundingLines.DataBufferCells.values Dim sU1 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD1Name(api) Dim sU2 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD2Name(api) Dim sU3 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD3Name(api) Dim sU4 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD4Name(api) Dim sU5 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD5Name(api) Dim sU6 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD6Name(api)
Dim dAmt As Decimal = dcCell.CellAmount
Dim sTgtMbrScriptForm As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":C#Local:S#" & sTargetScenario & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:F#" & sFlow & ":O#Forms:I#" & sEntityGeneral & ":U1#" & sU1 & "_General" & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None"
Dim targetCell As DataCell Dim targetCellInfo As DataCellInfoUsingMemberScript targetCellInfo = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, sCube, sTgtMbrScriptForm) targetCell = targetCellInfo.DataCellEx.DataCell
api.Data.SetDataCell(api.Data.GetDataCell(targetCell.DataCellPk).DataCellPk.CreateMemberScriptBuilder(api).GetMemberScript, dAmt, False, True)
Next '--Copy missing years for BO6 data-- Else sSrcMbrScript = "RemoveZeros(Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear - 1 & ":C#Local:E#" & sCube sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:I#Top:U7#Top:U8#Top)"
Dim dbFundingLines As DataBuffer = Nothing Try dbFundingLines = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sSrcMbrScript,,False)
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Import Manpower: Invalid Source Member Script. sSrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript) End Try For Each dcCell As DataBufferCell In dbFundingLines.DataBufferCells.values Dim sU1 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD1Name(api) Dim sU2 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD2Name(api) Dim sU3 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD3Name(api) Dim sU4 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD4Name(api) Dim sU5 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD5Name(api) Dim sU6 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD6Name(api)
Dim dAmt As Decimal = dcCell.CellAmount
Dim sTgtMbrScriptForm As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":C#Local:S#" & sTargetScenario & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":V#Periodic:A#BO6:F#" & sFlow & ":O#Forms:I#" & sEntityGeneral & ":U1#" & sU1 & "_General" & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None"
Dim targetCell As DataCell Dim targetCellInfo As DataCellInfoUsingMemberScript targetCellInfo = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, sCube, sTgtMbrScriptForm) targetCell = targetCellInfo.DataCellEx.DataCell
api.Data.SetDataCell(api.Data.GetDataCell(targetCell.DataCellPk).DataCellPk.CreateMemberScriptBuilder(api).GetMemberScript, dAmt, False, True) Next End If '--Copy overlapping years for BOC data-- If Not BOCSourceCell.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(0) Then sSrcMbrScript = "RemoveZeros(Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":C#Local:E#" & sCube sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#BOC:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:I#Top:U7#Top:U8#Top)"
Dim dbFundingLines As DataBuffer = Nothing Try dbFundingLines = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sSrcMbrScript,,False)
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Import Manpower: Invalid Source Member Script. sSrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript) End Try For Each dcCell As DataBufferCell In dbFundingLines.DataBufferCells.values Dim sU1 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD1Name(api) Dim sU2 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD2Name(api) Dim sU3 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD3Name(api) Dim sU4 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD4Name(api) Dim sU5 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD5Name(api) Dim sU6 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD6Name(api)
Dim dAmt As Decimal = dcCell.CellAmount
Dim sTgtMbrScriptForm As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":C#Local:S#" & sTargetScenario & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:F#" & sFlow & ":O#Forms:I#" & sEntityGeneral & ":U1#" & sU1 & "_General" & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6 & ":U7#None:U8#None"
Dim targetCell As DataCell Dim targetCellInfo As DataCellInfoUsingMemberScript targetCellInfo = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, sCube, sTgtMbrScriptForm) targetCell = targetCellInfo.DataCellEx.DataCell
api.Data.SetDataCell(api.Data.GetDataCell(targetCell.DataCellPk).DataCellPk.CreateMemberScriptBuilder(api).GetMemberScript, dAmt, False, True)
Next '--Copy missing years for BOC data-- Else
sSrcMbrScript = "RemoveZeros(Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sSourcePosition & ":T#" & sTargetYear - 1 & ":C#USD:E#" & sCube sSrcMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#BOC:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:I#Top:U7#Top:U8#Top)"
Dim dbFundingLines As DataBuffer = Nothing Try dbFundingLines = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sSrcMbrScript,,False) Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Reapply Inflation: Invalid Soure Member Script. sSrcMbrScript=" & sSrcMbrScript) End Try
For Each dcCell As DataBufferCell In dbFundingLines.DataBufferCells.values Dim sIC As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetICName(api) Dim sU1 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD1Name(api) Dim sU2 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD2Name(api) Dim sU3 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD3Name(api) Dim sU4 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD4Name(api) Dim sU5 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD5Name(api) Dim sU6 As String = dcCell.DataBufferCellPk.GetUD6Name(api)
Dim sInfRateScript As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sTargetScenario & ":T#" & sTargetFirstYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sCube & "_General" & ":V#Periodic:A#PGM_Inflation_Rate_Amt:O#BeforeAdj:I#None:F#None" sInfRateScript &= ":U1#" & sU1 & "_General" & ":U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
Dim dInflationRate As Decimal = 0 Try dInflationRate = api.data.GetDataCellEx(sInfRateScript).DataCell.CellAmount
Catch ex As Exception Throw New System.Exception( "Apply Inflation: Invalid Inflation Rate Member Script. sInfRateScript=" & sInfRateScript) End Try
Dim dAmt As Integer = dcCell.CellAmount * (1 + (dInflationRate/100)) 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"origamt=" & dcCell.CellAmount & ": inflate=" & dInflationRate & "inflate/100+1=" & (1 + (dInflationRate/100)) & "damt=" & dAmt) Dim sTgtMbrScriptForm As String = "Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sTargetScenario & ":T#" & sTargetYear & ":C#Local:E#" & sEntityGeneral & ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None"& ":I#" & sEntityGeneral & ":F#" & sFlow & ":U1#" & sU1 & "_General" & ":U2#" & sU2 & ":U3#" & sU3 & ":U4#" & sU4 & ":U5#" & sU5 & ":U6#" & sU6
Dim targetCell As DataCell Dim targetCellInfo As DataCellInfoUsingMemberScript targetCellInfo = BRApi.Finance.Data.GetDataCellUsingMemberScript(si, sCube, sTgtMbrScriptForm) targetCell = targetCellInfo.DataCellEx.DataCell
'Only write Labor Cost to cube if NOT manually inputted by user. If (targetCell.CellStatus.StorageType.ToString <> "Input" Or targetCell.CellStatus.IsRealData <> "True") Then api.Data.SetDataCell(api.Data.GetDataCell(targetCell.DataCellPk).DataCellPk.CreateMemberScriptBuilder(api).GetMemberScript, dAmt, False, True) End If
Next End If
Return Nothing Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region
End Class

file.name: CMD_PGM_Mbr_Lists.vb
file.sourceCode:
Imports System Imports System.Data Imports System.Data.Common Imports System.IO Imports System.Collections.Generic Imports System.Globalization Imports System.Linq Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic Imports System.Windows.Forms Imports OneStream.Shared.Common Imports OneStream.Shared.Wcf Imports OneStream.Shared.Engine Imports OneStream.Shared.Database Imports OneStream.Stage.Engine Imports OneStream.Stage.Database Imports OneStream.Finance.Engine Imports OneStream.Finance.Database
Imports System.Diagnostics
Namespace OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.CMD_PGM_Mbr_Lists Public Class MainClass ' Public Sub New() ' Function CreateProperty ' Property financeArgs As New FinanceRulesArgs ' End Sub Public Function Main(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As Object Try
'========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "Main"
#Region "Onestream Default function" Select Case api.FunctionType
Case Is = FinanceFunctionType.MemberListHeaders 'Dim objMemberListHeaders As New List(Of MemberListHeader) 'objMemberListHeaders.Add(new MemberListHeader("Sample Member List")) 'Return objMemberListHeaders
Case Is = FinanceFunctionType.MemberList 'Example: E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=MyBusinessRuleName, MemberListName=[Sample Member List], Name1=Value1) 'If args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Sample Member List") Then 'Dim objMemberListHeader As New MemberListHeader(args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName) 'Dim objMemberInfos As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, "E#Root.Base", Nothing) 'Dim objMemberList As New MemberList(objMemberListHeader, objMemberInfos) 'Return objMemberList 'End If #End Region
If args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows") Then #Region "GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows" Dim sRowMbrList As String = String.Join(",",Me.GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows(si,globals,api,args))
If sRowMbrList = "" Then Return Nothing Else Dim objMemberListHeader As New MemberListHeader(args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName) Dim objMemberInfos As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrList , Nothing) Dim objMemberList As New MemberList(objMemberListHeader, objMemberInfos) Return objMemberList
End If #End Region End If
If args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetREQRankedList") Then #Region "GetREQRankedList"
'Dim tStart As DateTime = Date.Now() Dim oREQList = Me.GetREQRankedList(si,globals,api,args) If oREQList Is Nothing Then Return Nothing Dim sRowMbrList As String = String.Join(",",oREQList)
If sRowMbrList = "" Then Return Nothing Else
Dim objMemberListHeader As New MemberListHeader(args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName)
Dim objMemberInfos As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrList , Nothing)
Dim objMemberList As New MemberList(objMemberListHeader, objMemberInfos)

'If entity is passed in like .Children when entity is not selected, it is rejeted If sEntityParam.StartsWith(".") Then Return Nothing Dim entityList() As String = sEntityParam.Split(",") 'entityList Dim sRemoveGeneral As String = "False" If args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.ContainsKey("RemoveGeneral") Then sRemoveGeneral = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs("RemoveGeneral") End If Dim sRowMbrList As String = "" Dim sCubeView As String = "" sCubeView = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("CubeView")
For Each sEntityItem As String In entityList If sremoveGeneral.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("True") Then sEntityItem = sEntityItem.Replace("_General","") '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data =============================================================================================================== '================================================================================================================================================== args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", sEntityItem)
Dim lsMasterREQList As List( Of String) = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args) '=================================================================== For Each sEntity As String In lsMasterREQList Dim sMemberScript As String = sEntity sEntity = sEntity.split("[")(1).split("]")(0)
If sEntity.XFContainsIgnoreCase("_General") And sremoveGeneral.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("True") Then Select Case True Case wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L2") 'do nothing Case wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L3") And ExceptionFCs.XFContainsIgnoreCase(wfCube) 'do nothing Case wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L3") Continue For Case wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L4") And ExceptionFCs.XFContainsIgnoreCase(wfCube) Continue For Case wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("L4") 'do nothing End Select End If
'Args to pass into dataset BR Dim dsArgs As New DashboardDataSetArgs dsargs.FunctionType = DashboardDataSetFunctionType.GetDataSet dsArgs.DataSetName = "REQListByEntity" dsArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", sEntity) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("CubeView", sCubeView) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("FundCenterPrompt", sEntityParam)
'Call dataset BR to return a datatable that has been filtered by REQ status Dim objDT As DataTable = BR_REQDataset.Main(si, globals, api, dsArgs) 'Loop through datatable to place REQ members into a comma delimited string For Each dtRow As DataRow In objDT.Rows 'Create args for flow parsing XFBR - added RMW-1004 Dim newArgs As DashboardStringFunctionArgs = New DashboardStringFunctionArgs newArgs.FunctionName="TitleParseFlow" newArgs.NameValuePairs.Add("title",dtRow.Item("Value")) Dim parsedFlow As String = BR_REQ_String_Helper.Main(si, globals, api, newArgs) If sMemberScript.XFContainsIgnoreCase(parsedFlow) Then If sRowMbrList = "" Then sRowMbrList = sMemberScript Else sRowMbrList &= "," & sMemberScript End If End If
Next Next Next 'Check if loop output values If sRowMbrList = "" Then Return Nothing Else
'build list from values provided by loop Dim objMemberListHeader As New MemberListHeader(args.MemberListArgs.MemberListName) Dim objMemberInfos As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrList , Nothing) Dim objMemberList As New MemberList(objMemberListHeader, objMemberInfos)
Return objMemberList End If
