#Region "Constants" Private BR_GeneralMemberLists As New OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.General_Member_Lists.MainClass Private BR_REQDataSet As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardDataSet.REQ_DataSet.MainClass Private BR_REQ_String_Helper As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardStringFunction.REQ_String_Helper.MainClass #End Region
#Region "GetREQ_IC" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' Created: 2023-Oct-10 - AK ' ' Purpose: return IC for a given FundCenter based on the L# we are at ' ' Invocation: MAIN() args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetREQ_IC") ' ' Usage Instructions from a cube view: ' E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=REQ_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetREQ_IC) ' ' Where: ' ' Usage Instructions from a rule: ' ' ' Dim sIC As MemberInfo = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si,api.pov.EntityDim.DimPk,"E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=REQ_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetREQ_IC) ' ' 'Modifications: '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetREQ_IC(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As String '(Commented temporary Try
'========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetREQ_IC"
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== workflow vars ========================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) ' Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) ' Dim iWFMonth As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetMonthIdFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sIC As String = ""
' If wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("CMD") Then
' Else
' End If
'Get workflow level Dim sWFLevel As String = wfProfileName.Substring(1,1) 'BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "sWFLevel = " & sWFLevel) Dim iWFLevel As String = CInt(sWFLevel) Dim sMode As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs("Mode")
Select Case True Case sMode.XFContainsIgnoreCase("Curr") 'do nothing Case sMode.XFContainsIgnoreCase("Prior")
iWFLevel = iWFLevel + 1 Case Else Throw New System.Exception("GetREQ_IC(): Invalid Mode = " & sMode ) End Select
'Get Fund Center Level Dim sFundCenter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs("FundCenter") Dim MemberFC As Member = api.Members.GetMember(dimtype.Entity.Id, sFundCenter) Dim EntDimPK As DimPk = api.Dimensions.GetDim("E_Army").DimPk Dim sFundCenterLevel As String = api.Entity.Text(MemberFC.MemberId, 3) 'Dim iFundCenterLevel As Integer = CInt(sFundCenterLevel.Split("=")(1).Replace("L","")) Dim iFundCenterLevel As Integer = CInt(sFundCenterLevel.Split("=")(1)) 'BRAPi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "GetREQ_IC: MemberFC=" & MemberFC.Name & " sMode=" & sMode & " sFundCenterLevel=" & sFundCenterLevel & " iFundCenterLevel=" & iFundCenterLevel & " sWFLevel=" & sWFLevel & " iWFLevel=" & iWFLevel) 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si," Case WF LEvel = " & iFundCenterLevel - iWFLevel) Select Case iFundCenterLevel - iWFLevel
Case -1 sIC = "None" Case 0 sIC = sFundCenter Case 1 sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,MemberFC.MemberId,False)(0).Name & "_General" Case 2 sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,MemberFC.MemberId,False)(0).Name Dim dimICID As Member = api.Members.GetMember(dimtype.Entity.Id,sIC) sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,dimICID.MemberId,False)(0).Name & "_General" Case 3 sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,MemberFC.MemberId,False)(0).Name Dim dimICID As Member = api.Members.GetMember(dimtype.Entity.Id,sIC) sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,dimICID.MemberId,False)(0).Name dimICID = api.Members.GetMember(dimtype.Entity.Id,sIC) sIC = api.Members.GetParents(EntDimPK,dimICID.MemberId,False)(0).Name & "_General" Case Else Throw New System.Exception("GetREQ_IC(): Fund Center Level variance is -1 > x > 3") End Select
Return sIC
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "GetREQRankedList()" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' Created: 2023-Oct-10 - AK ' ' Purpose: return list of REQ members orederd by rank and unranked REQs are appended to the end of the list ' ' Invocation: MAIN() args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetREQPriorityList") ' ' Usage Instructions from a cube view: ' E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=REQ_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetREQPriorityList, DimDef=E#F#, Entity=|WFCube|.base, Flow=Command_Requirements.base , EntityFilter= ) ' ' Where: ' DimDef= is a string of the dimensions you want returned ' ' Entity= can be a member( A5766 ) or a list( [A5766,A57XX] ) or a member expansion( TRADOC.base ) ' ' Flow= can be a member( REQ_01 ) or a list( [REQ_01,REQ_02] ) or a member expansion( Command_Requirements.base ) ' ' EntityFilter: ' NOTE: consider using bound parameter from a single select or mulitselect combobox ( i.e. EntityFilter=|!paramFundCenter!| ) ' NOTE: code will append member or list as a filter ' EntityFilter can be a member( A5766 ) or a list( [A5766,A57XX] ' ' Usage Instructions from a rule: ' ' ' Dim sEntity As String = api.Pov.Entity.Name ' ' Dim objMbrInfoList As List(Of MemberInfo) = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si,api.pov.EntityDim.DimPk,"E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=REQ_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetREQPriorityList, DimDef=E#F#, Entity=" & sEntity & ", Flow=Command_Requirements.base, EntityFilter= )",True) ' ' 'Modifications: '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetREQRankedList(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try
Dim lsDimMbrs = Me.GetDimMbrsList(si,globals,api,args) If lsDimMbrs Is Nothing Then Return Nothing
Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) 'Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = "48" 'BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim sFundCenter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxEntity").Trim
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== loop thru REQs and divide into ranked and unranked lists ==================================================================== '================================================================================================================================================== Dim lsRankedREQList As New List(Of REQ) Dim lsUnrankedREQList As New List(Of String) 'Dim wfLevel As String = wfProfileName.Substring(0,2) For Each sMbrScript As String In lsDimMbrs '--------- get REQ rank --------- Dim sREQRank_Script As String = sMbrScript & ":Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Priority_Override_Rank:I#" & sFundCenter & ":O#BeforeAdj:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None" Dim dREQRank As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sREQRank_Script).CellAmount 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,sDebugFuncName & " sREQRank_Script=" & sREQRank_Script & " dREQRank=" & dREQRank) 'BRapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"Line652") If dREQRank <> 0 Then Dim objREQ As New REQ objREQ.sMbrScript = sMbrScript objREQ.iRank = dREQRank lsRankedREQList.Add(objREQ) Else lsUnrankedREQList.Add(sMbrScript) End If
Next
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "Build List") '================================================================================================================================================== '========== build REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim lsREQList As New List(Of String)
'--------- add ranked REQs --------- If lsRankedREQList.Count > 0 Then Dim lsSortedRankedREQList = From objREQ In lsRankedREQList Order By objREQ.iRank For Each objREQ As REQ In lsSortedRankedREQList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, " objREQ.sMbrScript=" & objREQ.sMbrScript) lsREQList.Add(objREQ.sMbrScript) Next End If 'BRapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"Line683") '--------- add unranked REQs --------- If lsUnrankedREQList.Count > 0 Then lsREQList.AddRange(lsUnrankedREQList) End If 'BRapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"Line682") 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "lsREQList.Count = " & lsREQList.Count) '================================================================================================================================================== '========== return REQ list ======================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== 'BRapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"Exit GetREQRankedList") Return lsREQList Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "Get Dimensional Mbrs List By Status"
Public Function GetDimMbrsList(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetDimMbrsList"
Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) 'Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = "48" 'BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFMonth As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetMonthIdFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim BR_REQDataSet As New OneStream.BusinessRule.DashboardDataSet.REQ_DataSet.MainClass 'Passed parameters Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ReturnDim").trim Dim sEntityParam As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxEntity").trim Dim sTitleSearch As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TitleSearch", "") Dim sCPA As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("CPAFilter", "") Dim sMode As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("mode").trim
'If entity is passed in like .Children when entity is not selected, it is rejeted If sEntityParam.StartsWith(".") Then Return Nothing
'entityList Dim lsRowMbrList As New List(Of String) Dim sCubeView As String = "" sCubeView = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("CubeView") Dim lsEntity As New List(Of String) Dim lsFlow As New List(Of String) Dim sEntity As String = "" Dim sFlow As String = ""
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs based on status using REQ_DataSet ============================================================================================ '================================================================================================================================================== 'Args to pass into dataset BR Dim dsArgs As New DashboardDataSetArgs dsargs.FunctionType = DashboardDataSetFunctionType.GetDataSet dsArgs.DataSetName = "REQListByEntityAndStatus" dsArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", sEntityParam) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("CubeView", sCubeView) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("FundCenterPrompt", sEntityParam) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("TitleSearch", sTitleSearch) dsargs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("CPAFilter", sCPA)
'Call dataset BR to return a datatable that has been filtered by REQ status Dim objDT As New DataTable
objDT = BR_REQDataset.Main(si, globals, api, dsArgs)
If objDT.Rows.Count = 0 Then If sMode = "CVResult" Then Dim dt As New DataTable("REQListCVResult")
Dim objCol = New DataColumn objCol.ColumnName = "EntityFlow" objCol.DataType = GetType(String) objCol.DefaultValue = "" objCol.AllowDBNull = False dt.Columns.Add(objCol) BRApi.Utilities.SetSessionDataTable(si,si.UserName,"REQListCVResult",dt) End If Return Nothing End If
'Loop through datatable to place REQ members into a comma delimited string For Each dtRow As DataRow In objDT.Rows
'Create args for flow parsing XFBR - added RMW-1004 Dim FlowArgs As DashboardStringFunctionArgs = New DashboardStringFunctionArgs FlowArgs.FunctionName="TitleParseFlow" FlowArgs.NameValuePairs.Add("title",dtRow.Item("Value"))
Dim EntityArgs As DashboardStringFunctionArgs = New DashboardStringFunctionArgs EntityArgs.FunctionName="TitleParseEntity" EntityArgs.NameValuePairs.Add("title",dtRow.Item("Value"))
Dim parsedFlow As String = BR_REQ_String_Helper.Main(si, globals, api, FlowArgs) Dim parsedEntity As String = BR_REQ_String_Helper.Main(si, globals, api, EntityArgs)
lsRowMbrList.Add($"E#[{parsedEntity}]:F#[{parsedFlow}]".ToLower) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,$"E#[{parsedEntity}]:F#[{parsedFlow}]") If Not lsEntity.Contains(parsedEntity) Then lsEntity.Add(parsedEntity) End If If Not lsFlow.Contains(parsedFlow) Then lsFlow.Add(parsedFlow) End If
Next
'Check if loop output values If lsRowMbrList.Count = 0 Then Return Nothing Else sEntity = String.Join(",",lsEntity) sFlow = String.Join(",",lsFlow)
'sEntity = "A97AB,A97AC...." 'sFlow = "01,03,..." End If '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data based on Filters using General_Member_lists =================================================================== '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim lsMasterDimList As New List( Of String) If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sDimDef) Then Return lsRowMbrList Else If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If If wfProfileName.XFContainsIgnoreCase("Rollover") Then iWFYear = iWFYear - 1 wfScenarioName = $"PGM_C{iWFYear}" End If 'Commented by Fronz 09/27/2024 - need to check for data values within FYDP 5 year timeframe rather than current WF year 'Updated 11/5/24 by JM - Updated to add U6# Filter 'Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U5#Top:U6#Top:U7#Top:U8#None" Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U5#Top:U7#Top:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iWFYear & ", " & iWFYear+1 & ", " & iWFYear+2 & ", " & iWFYear+3 & ", " & iWFYear+4 ) ' Dim sEntity As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Entity").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", sEntity)
' Dim sFlow As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Flow").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlow) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True") Dim sIC As String = "" If args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.ContainsKey("IC") Then sIC = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("IC").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("IC", sIC) End If
Dim sEntityFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("EntityFilter").trim
Dim FlowFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FlowFilter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(FlowFilter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":F#Command_Requirements.Base" ' args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("EntityFilter", sEntityFilter) Dim U1ParentFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U1ParentFilter").trim Dim U1Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U1Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U1Filter) And String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U1ParentFilter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U1#Top" ' If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U1Filter) Then args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("U1Filter", U1Filter)
Dim U2Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U2Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U2Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U2#Top" ' If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U2Filter) Then args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("U2Filter", U2Filter)
Dim U3ParentFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U3ParentFilter").trim ' If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3ParentFilter) Then args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("U3ParentFilter", U3ParentFilter)
Dim U3Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U3Filter").trim ' If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3Filter) Then args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("U3Filter", U3Filter)
If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3Filter) And String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3ParentFilter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U3#Top"
Dim U4Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U4Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U4Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U4#Top" ' If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U4Filter) Then args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("U4Filter", U4Filter) Dim U6Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U6Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U6Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U6#Top"
If args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.ContainsKey("ICFilter") Then Dim sICFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ICFilter").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ICFilter", sICFilter) End If 'BRapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,"ent: " & sEntity & " flow: " &sFlow & " IC: " & sIC & "EntityFiler = " & sEntityFilter) lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args)
End If
Dim lsDimMbrs As New List(Of String) Dim lsCacheDimMbrs As New List(Of String) For Each x As String In lsRowMbrList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "x= " & x) For Each y As String In lsMasterDimList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, "y= " & y) If y.Contains(x) Then If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#F#") Then lsDimMbrs.Add(y) lsCacheDimMbrs.Add(x) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, y) Else lsDimMbrs.Add(y.Replace($"{x}:","")) End If End If Next Next
If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then Return Nothing lsDimMbrs = lsDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList() lsDimMbrs.Sort()
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== If the cubeview passed in an arg of CVResult, write and cache a data table of the EntityFlow list ===================================== '========== This data table is used to grab the list of 'filtered' requirement for mass submission (validate, prioritication, approve) ============ '========== Data Table is used in REQ_SOlutionHelper ex: ValidateREQS ============================================================================ '================================================================================================================================================== If sMode = "CVResult" Then lsCacheDimMbrs = lsCacheDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList() lsCacheDimMbrs.Sort()
Dim dt As New DataTable("REQListCVResult")
Dim objCol = New DataColumn objCol.ColumnName = "EntityFlow" objCol.DataType = GetType(String) objCol.DefaultValue = "" objCol.AllowDBNull = False dt.Columns.Add(objCol)
For Each item As String In lsCacheDimMbrs Dim row As DataRow = dt.NewRow() row("EntityFlow") = item dt.Rows.Add(row) Next BRApi.Utilities.SetSessionDataTable(si,si.UserName,"REQListCVResult",dt) End If
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== If provided a cache name, cache the list as a string in user session variable (operate in the same principle as GetFilteredDataRow) === '================================================================================================================================================== Dim sCacheName As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("CacheName").Trim If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then BRApi.Utilities.SetWorkspaceSessionSetting(si, si.UserName, "FilteredDataRows", sCacheName, "") Else '----- store row headers to user session variable ----- If sCacheName <> "" Then BRApi.Utilities.SetWorkspaceSessionSetting(si, si.UserName, "FilteredDataRows", sCacheName, String.Join(",",lsDimMbrs)) End If
Return lsDimMbrs Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "GetAllREQList() new" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' PURPOSE: return list of all E#F# requirements - searches data attachment table where REQ_Title is not blank ' ' LOGIC OVERVIEW: ' - SQL query against table = DATAATTACHMENT where REQ_Title is not empty ' - return list of E#F# ' ' USAGE: ' - From another rule: ' Public REQ_Member_Lists As New OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.REQ_Member_Lists.MainClass ' ' args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs ' args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Year", iPriorYear) ' Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) ' ' MODIFIED: ' <date> <user id> <JIRA ticket> <change description> ' 2024-04-02 AK RMW-1171 created ' 2024-09-03 KN ' 2024-09-23 EH RMW-1732 revert req_shared and updated to return E#None:F#None when empty '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetAllREQList(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try
'========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetAllREQList"
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== workflow vars ========================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sCurrScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim iCurrYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sTitleScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim sTitleYear As String = iCurrYear.ToString
Dim lsEntity As New List(Of String) Dim lsFlow As New List(Of String)
Dim scbxEntity As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxEntity").trim If scbxEntity.Split(".")(0) = "" Then scbxEntity = sCube & ".base" If scbxEntity = "" Then scbxEntity = "ARMY.base"
Dim scbxScenario As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxScenario").trim If scbxScenario <> "" Then sCube = "ARMY" sCurrScenario = scbxScenario iCurrYear = CInt(scbxScenario.Substring(5,4)) 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": iCurrWFYear=" & iCurrWFYear) End If
Dim iEntId As Integer = api.Members.GetMemberId(dimtype.Entity.Id, scbxEntity.Split(".")(0))
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": scbxEntity=" & scbxEntity)
Dim bEntIsBase As Boolean = Not api.Members.HasChildren(api.Pov.EntityDim.DimPk, iEntId, Nothing)
Dim sFlowMbrFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FlowMbr","Command_Requirements.Base.Where(Name doesnotcontain REQ_00)").trim 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFlowMbrFilter=" & sFlowMbrFilter & " bEntIsBase=" & bEntIsBase & " scbxEntity=" & scbxEntity)
Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ReturnDim").trim Dim sTimeOffset As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TimeOffset").trim Dim sTitleSearch As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TitleSearch","") 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: sMode = {sMode} || sTitleSearch: {sTitleSearch}")
Dim sScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim iYear As Integer = iCurrYear Select Case True Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 2 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 2 End Select
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sScenario=" & sScenario & " iYear=" & iYear & " sCurrScenario = " & sCurrScenario & " sTimeOffset=" & sTimeOffset )
Dim lsAllREQList As New List( Of String) Dim lsMasterDimList As New List( Of String)
If sFlowMbrFilter= "Top" Then 'lsAllREQList.Add("E#[" & scbxEntity & "]:F#[" & sFlowMbrFilter & "]")
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sDataBufferPOVScript=" & sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsMasterDimList=" & String.Join(", " , lsMasterDimList))
Return lsMasterDimList
Else '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim SQL As New Text.StringBuilder SQL.Append("Select CUBE, SCENARIO, TIME, CONS, ENTITY, FLOW From DATAATTACHMENT Where ACCOUNT = 'REQ_Title' And CONS = 'USD' And SCENARIO = '" & sScenario & "' And TIME = '" & iYear.ToString & "'") If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sTitleSearch) Then SQL.Append($" AND TEXT LIKE '%{sTitleSearch}%'") End If 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": SQL: " & SQL.ToString) Dim dtRollFwdReq As DataTable
Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) dtRollFwdReq = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn,SQL.ToString(),True) End Using 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count = {dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count}")
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== build REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim mbrEntityList As List(Of MemberInfo) = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si, "E_ARMY", "E#" & scbxEntity, True)
If dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count > 0 Then For Each drReq As DataRow In dtRollFwdReq.Rows '---- reduce list to only entities within filter ----- For Each MbrInfo In mbrEntityList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: mbrinfo.Member.Name=" & mbrinfo.Member.Name & "drReq(Entit)=" & drReq("Entity") ) If Not mbrinfo.Member.Name.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(drReq("Entity")) Then Continue For lsAllREQList.Add($"E#[{drReq("Entity")}]:F#[{drReq("Flow")}]".ToLower) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: E#[{drReq("Entity")}]:F#[{drReq("Flow")}]".ToLower) Next Next End If
'Check if loop output values 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: lsAllREQList.Count = {lsAllREQList.Count}") If lsAllREQList.Count = 0 Then Return lsAllREQList End If
End If
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsAllREQList=" & String.Join(", " , lsAllREQList))
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data based on Filters using General_Member_lists =================================================================== '==================================================================================================================================================
If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sDimDef) Then Return lsAllREQList Else
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sDataBufferPOVScript=" & sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsMasterDimList=" & String.Join(", " , lsMasterDimList))
Dim lsDimMbrs As New List(Of String) For Each x As String In lsAllREQList For Each y As String In lsMasterDimList If y.Contains(x) Then If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#F#") Then lsDimMbrs.Add(y) Else lsDimMbrs.Add(y.Replace($"{x}:","")) End If End If Next Next 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sScenario=" & sScenario & " lsDimMbrs=" & String.Join(", " , lsDimMbrs))
If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then Return lsDimMbrs End If lsDimMbrs = lsDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList()
Return lsDimMbrs
End If
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "GetFirstYOYGrowthRows()" Public Function GetFirstYOYGrowthRows(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetFirstYOYGrowthRows"
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": Here99")
'========== workflow vars ============================================================================================================ Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFMonth As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetMonthIdFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sPriorScenario As String = wfScenarioName.Replace(iWFYear.ToString, (iWFYear - 1).ToString) Dim sPriorYear As String = (iWFYear - 1).ToString
Dim sRowMode As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("RowMode") 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sMsRowModeode=" & sRowMode) If sRowMode.trim = "" Then sRowMode = "AllRows" 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sRowMode=" & sRowMode)
Dim sMlDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("MlDimDef") Dim sEntitySelection As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("EntitySelection")
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sEntitySelection=" & sEntitySelection)
'========== get reqs ============================================================================================================ 'args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("cbxEntity", sEntitySelection) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("FlowMbr", "Top") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("TimeOffset", "")
'args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#U1#U2#U3#U4#U5#U6#")
'Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = Me.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsReqAllList count=" & lsReqAllList.Count & " List =" & String.Join(", ", lsReqAllList))
If lsReqAllList.Count = 0 Then Return lsReqAllList
'----- get YOY Pct limit ----- Dim sACOM As String = BRapi.Finance.Entity.Text(si, BRapi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,dimtype.Entity.Id, wfCube), 1, 0, 0) Dim sYOYPctLimitMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sACOM & "_General" sYOYPctLimitMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Key5_YOY_Prct_Limit:O#Forms:I#None:F#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
'----- get PY requested amount ----- Dim dYOYPctLimitAmt As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sYOYPctLimitMbrScript).CellAmount / 100 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sYOYPctLimitMbrScript=" & sYOYPctLimitMbrScript & " amount = " & dYOYPctLimitAmt)
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs '-------------------------------------
Dim lsPassRowList As New List( Of String) Dim lsFailRowList As New List( Of String) Dim lsWarnRowList As New List( Of String)
For Each sReqAllListMbrScript As String In lsReqAllList Dim sEntity As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(1).Split("]")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(2).Split("]")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(3).Split("]")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(4).Split("]")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(5).Split("]")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(6).Split("]")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(7).Split("]")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(8).Split("]")(0) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sEntity=" & sEntity & " sFlow=" & sFlow & " sU1=" & sU1 & " sU2=" & sU2 & " sU3=" & sU3 & " sU4=" & sU4 & " sU5=" & sU5 & " sU6=" & sU6 )
'----- get CY requested amount ----- Dim sCYMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sCYMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:I#Top:U7#None:U8#None"
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "F#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U1#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U2#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U3#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U4#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U5#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U6#Top" End If Dim dCYReqAmt As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sCYMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sPYMbrScript=" & sPYMbrScript)
'----- get PY requested amount ----- Dim sPYMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & sPriorYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sPYMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:O#Forms:I#Top:U7#None:U8#None"
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "F#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U1#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U2#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U3#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U4#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U5#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U6#Top" End If
Dim dPYReqAmt As Decimal = 0 If api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(brapi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si,"S_Main"), "S#" &sPriorScenario).Count > 0 Then dPYReqAmt = api.Data.GetDataCell(sPYMbrScript).CellAmount
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sPYMbrScript=" & sPYMbrScript)
Dim dYOYVarPct As Decimal = 0 Select Case True Case dPYReqAmt = 0 And dCYReqAmt <> 0 dYOYVarPct = 1 Case dPYReqAmt = 0 And dCYReqAmt = 0 dYOYVarPct = 0 Case Else dYOYVarPct = (dCYReqAmt - dPYReqAmt) / dPYReqAmt End Select
'----- test if var pct is over limit ----- Dim bPass As Boolean = dYOYVarPct <= .02 Dim bWarn As Boolean = .02 < dYOYVarPct And dYOYVarPct < dYOYPctLimitAmt Dim bFail As Boolean = dYOYPctLimitAmt <= dYOYVarPct
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": PY amount = " & dPYReqAmt & " CY amount = " & dCYReqAmt & " dYOYVarPct = " & dYOYVarPct & " bPass = " & bPass & " bWarn = " & bWarn & " bFail = " & bFail & " sCYMbrScript=" & sCYMbrScript)
'----- build return member script ----- Dim sMlMbrScript As String = ""
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("S#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "S#" & wfScenarioName End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("T#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "T#" & wfTimeName End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "E#" & sEntity End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("A#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "A#" & "REQ_Requested_Amt" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("I#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "I#" & sEntity End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("O#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "O#" & "Forms" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U7#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U7#" & "None" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U8#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U8#" & "None" End If
'========== build pass/warn/fail lists ============================================================================================================ If bPass And Not lsPassRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsPassRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
If bWarn And Not lsWarnRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsWarnRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
If bFail And Not lsFailRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsFailRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
Next
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsFailRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsWarnRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsPassRowList) )
'========== build return list based on Mode ============================================================================================================
Dim lsRowList As New List( Of String)
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "failrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sFailRow As String In lsFailRowList 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFailRow=" & sFailRow ) If Not lsRowList.Contains(sFailRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sFailRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList.count=" & lsFailRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "warnrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sWarnRow As String In lsWarnRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sWarnRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sWarnRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList.count=" & lsWarnRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "passrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sPassRow As String In lsPassRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sPassRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sPassRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList.count=" & lsPassRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsRowList) )
Return lsRowList
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region
#Region "GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows()" Public Function GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetFirstMDEPYOYGrowthRows"
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": Here99")
'========== workflow vars ============================================================================================================ Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFMonth As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetMonthIdFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sPriorScenario As String = wfScenarioName.Replace(iWFYear.ToString, (iWFYear - 1).ToString) Dim sPriorYear As String = (iWFYear - 1).ToString
Dim sRowMode As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("RowMode") 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sMsRowModeode=" & sRowMode) If sRowMode.trim = "" Then sRowMode = "AllRows" 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sRowMode=" & sRowMode)
Dim sMlDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("MlDimDef") Dim sEntitySelection As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("EntitySelection")
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sEntitySelection=" & sEntitySelection)
'========== get reqs ============================================================================================================ 'args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("cbxEntity", sEntitySelection) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("FlowMbr", "Top") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("TimeOffset", "")
'args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnDim", "E#F#U1#U2#U3#U4#U5#U6#")
'Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = Me.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsReqAllList count=" & lsReqAllList.Count & " List =" & String.Join(", ", lsReqAllList))
If lsReqAllList.Count = 0 Then Return lsReqAllList
'----- get YOY Pct limit ----- Dim sACOM As String = BRapi.Finance.Entity.Text(si, BRapi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,dimtype.Entity.Id, wfCube), 1, 0, 0) Dim sYOYPctLimitMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sACOM & "_General" sYOYPctLimitMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_MDEP_YOY_Prct_Limit:O#Forms:I#None:F#None:U1#None:U2#None:U3#None:U4#None:U5#None:U6#None:U7#None:U8#None"
'----- get PY requested amount ----- Dim dYOYPctLimitAmt As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sYOYPctLimitMbrScript).CellAmount / 100 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sYOYPctLimitMbrScript=" & sYOYPctLimitMbrScript & " amount = " & dYOYPctLimitAmt)
'------------------------------------- ' loop thru reqs '-------------------------------------
Dim lsPassRowList As New List( Of String) Dim lsFailRowList As New List( Of String) Dim lsWarnRowList As New List( Of String)
For Each sReqAllListMbrScript As String In lsReqAllList Dim sEntity As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(1).Split("]")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(2).Split("]")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(3).Split("]")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(4).Split("]")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(5).Split("]")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(6).Split("]")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(7).Split("]")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(8).Split("]")(0) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sEntity=" & sEntity & " sFlow=" & sFlow & " sU1=" & sU1 & " sU2=" & sU2 & " sU3=" & sU3 & " sU4=" & sU4 & " sU5=" & sU5 & " sU6=" & sU6 )
'----- get CY requested amount ----- Dim sCYMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sCYMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None"
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "F#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U1#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U2#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U3#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U4#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U5#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sCYMbrScript) Then sCYMbrScript &= ":" sCYMbrScript &= "U6#Top" End If
Dim dCYReqAmt As Decimal = api.Data.GetDataCell(sCYMbrScript).CellAmount 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sPYMbrScript=" & sPYMbrScript)
'----- get PY requested amount ----- Dim sPYMbrScript As String = "Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & sPriorScenario & ":T#" & iWFYear & ":C#USD:E#" & sEntity sPYMbrScript &= ":V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#Forms:U7#None:U8#None"
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "F#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U1#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U2#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U3#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U4#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U5#Top" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 Else If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sPYMbrScript) Then sPYMbrScript &= ":" sPYMbrScript &= "U6#Top" End If
Dim dPYReqAmt As Decimal = 0 If api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(brapi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si,"S_Main"), "S#" & sPriorScenario).Count > 0 Then dPYReqAmt = api.Data.GetDataCell(sPYMbrScript).CellAmount
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sPYMbrScript=" & sPYMbrScript & " sPriorScenario).Count=" & api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(brapi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si,"S_Main"), "S#" & sPriorScenario).Count)
Dim dYOYVarPct As Decimal = 0 Select Case True Case dPYReqAmt = 0 And dCYReqAmt <> 0 dYOYVarPct = 1 Case dPYReqAmt = 0 And dCYReqAmt = 0 dYOYVarPct = 0 Case Else dYOYVarPct = (dCYReqAmt - dPYReqAmt) / dPYReqAmt End Select
'----- test if var pct is over limit ----- Dim bPass As Boolean = dYOYVarPct <= .02 Dim bWarn As Boolean = .02 < dYOYVarPct And dYOYVarPct < dYOYPctLimitAmt Dim bFail As Boolean = dYOYPctLimitAmt <= dYOYVarPct
BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": PY amount = " & dPYReqAmt & " CY amount = " & dCYReqAmt & " dYOYVarPct = " & dYOYVarPct & " bPass = " & bPass & " bWarn = " & bWarn & " bFail = " & bFail & " sCYMbrScript=" & sCYMbrScript)
'----- build return member script ----- Dim sMlMbrScript As String = ""
If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("S#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "S#" & wfScenarioName End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("T#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "T#" & wfTimeName End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "E#" & sEntity End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("A#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "A#" & "REQ_Requested_Amt" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("I#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "I#" & sEntity End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "F#" & sFlow End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("O#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "O#" & "Forms" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U7#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U7#" & "None" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U8#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U8#" & "None" End If
'========== build pass/warn/fail lists ============================================================================================================ If bPass And Not lsPassRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsPassRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
If bWarn And Not lsWarnRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsWarnRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
If bFail And Not lsFailRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsFailRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
Next
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsFailRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsWarnRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsPassRowList) )
'========== build return list based on Mode ============================================================================================================
Dim lsRowList As New List( Of String)
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "failrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sFailRow As String In lsFailRowList 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFailRow=" & sFailRow ) If Not lsRowList.Contains(sFailRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sFailRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList.count=" & lsFailRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "warnrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sWarnRow As String In lsWarnRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sWarnRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sWarnRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList.count=" & lsWarnRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "passrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sPassRow As String In lsPassRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sPassRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sPassRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList.count=" & lsPassRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsRowList) )
Return lsRowList
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region
#Region "GetReviewcProbeToRqstAmt()" Public Function GetReviewcProbeToRqstAmt(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetReviewcProbeToRqstAmt"

Dim sPGMSelection As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("PGMSelection") Dim sScenarioName As String = sPGMSelection If sPGMSelection = "" Then Return lsEmptyAllList
Dim sTimeName As String = sPGMSelection.Substring(5,4) Dim iYear As Integer = CInt(sTimeName) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sPGMSelection=" & sPGMSelection & " wfScenarioName=" & wfScenarioName & " wfTimeName=" & wfTimeName )
Dim sPriorScenario As String = sScenarioName.Replace(iYear.ToString, (iYear - 1).ToString) Dim sPriorYear As String = (iYear - 1).ToString
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript As String = "Cb#ARMY:C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj::U5#Top:U6#Top:U7#None:U8#None:S#" & sScenarioName & ":T#" & sTimeName 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sDataBufferPOVScript=" & sDataBufferPOVScript)

If lsReqAllList.Count = 0 Then Return lsReqAllList
'========== convert FundCode to L2 Appn due to cProbe level of detail ============================================================================================================ Dim lsReqAllList_L2Appn As New List(Of String) For Each sReqAllListMbrScript As String In lsReqAllList 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sReqAllListMbrScript=" & sReqAllListMbrScript) Dim sEntity As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(1).Split("]")(0) Dim sFlow As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(2).Split("]")(0) Dim sU1 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(3).Split("]")(0) Dim sU2 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(4).Split("]")(0) Dim sU3 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(5).Split("]")(0) Dim sU4 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(6).Split("]")(0) Dim sU5 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(7).Split("]")(0) Dim sU6 As String = sReqAllListMbrScript.Split("[")(8).Split("]")(0) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sU1=" & sU1)

sReqAllListMbrScript = sReqAllListMbrScript.Replace(su1,sU1_Parent ) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sReqAllListMbrScript=" & sReqAllListMbrScript)
If Not lsReqAllList_L2Appn.Contains(sReqAllListMbrScript) Then lsReqAllList_L2Appn.Add(sReqAllListMbrScript)
Next
