sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("O#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "O#" & "Forms" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U1#" & sU1 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U2#" & sU2 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U3#" & sU3 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U4#" & sU4 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U5#" & sU5 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U6#" & sU6 End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U7#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U7#" & "None" End If If sMlDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U8#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMlMbrScript) Then sMlMbrScript &= ":" sMlMbrScript &= "U8#" & "None" End If
' '========== build pass/warn/fail lists ============================================================================================================ ' If bPass And Not lsPassRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsPassRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript) If Not lsPassRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsPassRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
' If bWarn And Not lsWarnRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsWarnRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
' If bFail And Not lsFailRowList.Contains(sMlMbrScript) Then lsFailRowList.Add(sMlMbrScript)
Next
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsFailRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsWarnRowList) ) 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsPassRowList) )
'========== build return list based on Mode ============================================================================================================
Dim lsRowList As New List( Of String)
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "failrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sFailRow As String In lsFailRowList 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFailRow=" & sFailRow ) If Not lsRowList.Contains(sFailRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sFailRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsFailRowList.count=" & lsFailRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "warnrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sWarnRow As String In lsWarnRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sWarnRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sWarnRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsWarnRowList.count=" & lsWarnRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
If sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "passrows" Or sRowMode.Trim.ToLower = "allrows" Then For Each sPassRow As String In lsPassRowList If Not lsRowList.Contains(sPassRow) Then lsRowList.Add(sPassRow) Next End If 'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsPassRowList.count=" & lsPassRowList.count & " lsRowList.count=" & lsRowList.count )
'BRAPI.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsRowList=" & String.Join(",", lsRowList) ) Return lsRowList
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region '
#Region "GetAllREQListReapplyInflation" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' PURPOSE: return list of all E#F# requirements - searches data attachment table where REQ_Title is not blank ' ' LOGIC OVERVIEW: ' - SQL query against table = DATAATTACHMENT where REQ_Title is not empty ' - return list of E#F# ' ' USAGE: ' -Used to get All REQs for Reapply Inflation Rates calculation in REQ_Main_Calc ' MODIFIED: '10/3/24 - Created by JM '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetAllREQListReapplyInflation(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '================================================================================================================================================== '========== workflow vars ========================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sCurrScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim iCurrWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sTitleScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim sTitleYear As String = iCurrWFYear.ToString
Dim lsEntity As New List(Of String) Dim lsFlow As New List(Of String)
Dim sEntityMbrfilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("EntityMbrFilter").trim Dim sFlowMbrFilter As String = "Command_Requirements.Base.Where(Name doesnotcontain REQ_00)" Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ReturnDim").trim Dim sMode As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Mode").trim Dim sTitleSearch As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TitleSearch","")
Dim sScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim iYear As Integer = iCurrWFYear Select Case True Case sMode.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Current") sScenario = sCurrScenario iYear = iCurrWFYear End Select
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim SQL As New Text.StringBuilder SQL.Append("Select CUBE, SCENARIO, TIME, CONS, ENTITY, FLOW From DATAATTACHMENT Where ACCOUNT = 'REQ_Title' And CUBE = '" & sCube & "' And CONS = 'USD' And SCENARIO = '" & sScenario & "' And TIME = '" & iYear.ToString & "'") If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sTitleSearch) Then SQL.Append($" AND TEXT LIKE '%{sTitleSearch}%'") End If
Dim dtReapply As DataTable Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) dtReapply = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn,SQL.ToString(),True) End Using '================================================================================================================================================== '========== build REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim mbrEntityList = sEntityMbrfilter Dim lsAllREQList As New List( Of String) If dtReapply.Rows.Count > 0 Then For Each drReq As DataRow In dtReapply.Rows '---- reduce list to only entities within filter ----- lsAllREQList.Add($"E#[{drReq("Entity")}]:F#[{drReq("Flow")}]".ToLower)
Next
End If
'Check if loop output values If lsAllREQList.Count = 0 Then lsAllREQList.Add("E#[None]:F#[None]") Return lsAllREQList End If '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data based on Filters using General_Member_lists =================================================================== '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim lsMasterDimList As New List( Of String) If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sDimDef) Then Return lsAllREQList Else
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#" & sCube & ":S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_Requested_Amt:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U5#Top:U6#Top:U7#None:U8#None"
args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", sEntityMbrfilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True") Dim sIC As String = "" If args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.ContainsKey("IC") Then sIC = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("IC").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("IC", sIC) End If
Dim sEntityFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("EntityFilter").trim
Dim U1Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U1Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U1Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U1#Top"
Dim U2Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U2Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U2Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U2#Top"
Dim U3ParentFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U3ParentFilter").trim
Dim U3Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U3Filter").trim
If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3Filter) And String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U3ParentFilter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U3#Top"
Dim U4Filter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("U4Filter").trim If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(U4Filter) Then sDataBufferPOVScript &= ":U4#Top"
If args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.ContainsKey("ICFilter") Then Dim sICFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ICFilter").trim args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ICFilter", sICFilter) End If
args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args)
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsMasterDimList=" & String.Join(", " , lsMasterDimList)) End If
Dim lsDimMbrs As New List(Of String) For Each x As String In lsAllREQList For Each y As String In lsMasterDimList If y.Contains(x) Then If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#F#") Then lsDimMbrs.Add(y) Else lsDimMbrs.Add(y.Replace($"{x}:","")) End If End If Next Next
If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then lsDimMbrs.Add("E#[None]:F#[None]") Return lsDimMbrs End If lsDimMbrs = lsDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList() Return lsDimMbrs
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
#Region "GetNoDataRows()" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' Created: 2022-Jun-2 - AK ' ' Purpose: return list of member combinations where data does not exist ' ' Invocation: MAIN() args.FunctionName.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("GetNoDataRows") ' ' Usage Instructions from a cube view: ' E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=SPI_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetNoDataRows, DimDef=E#U1#U2#U3#U6#U7#, Entity=|WFCube|.base, EntityFilter= , U1Filter= , U2Filter= , U3Filter=, U6Filter=, U7Filter=, DataBufferScript=[RemoveZeros(FilterMembers(Cb#|WFCube|:S#|WFScenario|:T#|WFTime|:E#X_X_X_X_X:C#Local:V#Periodic:A#Total_Target_Distr_Budget:I#None:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:U4#Base:U5#None:U8#None, S#|WFScenario|:U1#APPN.Base, S#|WFScenario|:U2#PEG.base, S#|WFScenario|:U3#SAG.base, S#|WFScenario|:U6#Obj_Class.base, S#|WFScenario|:U7#UIC.base))] ) ' ' ' Usage Instructions from a rule: ' Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName ' Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) ' Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) ' ' Dim DataBufferScript as String ="RemoveZeros(FilterMembers(Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & wfTimeName & ":E#" & EntityMbrInbfo.Member.Name & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#Phased_Obligation:I#Top:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:U5#Top:U6#Pay_Benefits:U7#Top:U8#None, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U1#OM.Children, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U2#PEG.base, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U3#SAG.base, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U4#Top.base))"
' BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si,"E_" & wfCube,"E#Root.CustomMemberList(BRName=AK_SPI_Member_Lists, MemberListName=GetNoDataRows, Entity=" & sEntity & ")",True) ' '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetNoDataRows(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try '========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetNoDataRows"
'========== routine vars ============================================================================================================ Dim wfProfileName As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).Name Dim wfCube = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim wfScenarioName As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim wfScenarioTypeID As Integer = BRApi.Finance.Scenario.GetScenarioType(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey).Id Dim wfTimeName As String = BRApi.Finance.Time.GetNameFromId(si,si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey) Dim iWFMonth As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetMonthIdFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
'========== dim definition ============================================================================================================ Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("DimDef")
'========== entity list ============================================================================================================ Dim sEntity As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Entity")
Dim sEntityMbrScript As String Select Case True Case sEntity.Trim = "" sEntityMbrScript = "E#" & wfCube Case Else sEntityMbrScript = "E#" & sEntity End Select Dim objEntDimPK As DimPk = brapi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si,"E_" & wfCube) Dim objListOfEntityMbrInfo As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(objEntDimPK, sEntityMbrScript , Nothing)
'========== data buffer script ============================================================================================================ Dim sDataBufferScript As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("DataBufferScript")
'========== loop thru entities ============================================================================================================ Dim lsRowList As New List( Of String)
For Each EntityMbrInbfo As MemberInfo In objListOfEntityMbrInfo Dim sEntityMbr As String = EntityMbrInbfo.member.name
Dim sDataBufferScript2 As String = sDataBufferScript.Replace("X_X_X_X_X", sEntityMbr) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,sDebugFuncName & ": sDataBufferScript2=" & sDataBufferScript2)
'========== get data buffer ============================================================================================================ 'Dim objDataBuffer As DataBuffer = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula("RemoveZeros(FilterMembers(Cb#" & wfCube & ":S#" & wfScenarioName & ":T#" & wfTimeName & ":E#" & sEntityMbr & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#Phased_Obligation:I#Top:F#Baseline:O#BeforeAdj:U5#Top:U6#Pay_Benefits:U7#Top:U8#None, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U1#OM.Children, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U2#PEG.base, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U3#SAG.base, S#" & wfScenarioName & ":U4#Top.base)))",,False) Dim objDataBuffer As DataBuffer = api.Data.GetDataBufferUsingFormula(sDataBufferScript2,,False)
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,sDebugFuncName & ": EntityName=" & sEntityMbr & " Cells=" & objDataBuffer.DataBufferCells.Count & " Script=" & objDataBUffer.CommonDataBufferCellPk.GetMemberScript(api))
If objDataBuffer.DataBufferCells.Count = 0 Then
'========== build member script ============================================================================================================ Dim sMbrScript As String = "" If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript = "E#" & sEntityMbr End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("A#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "A#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("I#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "I#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "F#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("O#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "O#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U1#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U1#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U2#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U2#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U3#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U3#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U4#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U4#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U5#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U5#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U6#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U6#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U7#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U7#None" End If If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("U8#") Then If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sMbrScript) Then sMbrScript &= ":" sMbrScript &= "U8#None" End If
'========== add member script to list ============================================================================================================ If Not lsRowList.Contains(sMbrScript.ToLower) Then lsRowList.Add(sMbrScript.ToLower) End If
'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si,sDebugFuncName & ": sMode=" & sMode & " Entity=" & sEntity & " Row List=" & String.Join(",",lsRowList))
End If
Next
lsRowList.Sort()
Return lsRowList
Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
#End Region
#Region "GetAllREQList() Rollover" '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' PURPOSE: return list of all E#F# requirements - searches data attachment table where REQ_Title is not blank ' ' LOGIC OVERVIEW: ' - SQL query against table = DATAATTACHMENT where REQ_Title is not empty ' - return list of E#F# ' ' USAGE: ' - From another rule: ' Public REQ_Member_Lists As New OneStream.BusinessRule.Finance.REQ_Member_Lists.MainClass ' ' args.MemberListArgs = New MemberListArgs ' args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Year", iPriorYear) ' Dim lsReqAllList As List(Of String) = REQ_Member_Lists.GetAllREQList(si, globals, api, args) ' ' MODIFIED: ' <date> <user id> <JIRA ticket> <change description> ' 2024-04-02 AK RMW-1171 created ' 2024-09-03 KN ' 2024-09-23 EH RMW-1732 revert req_shared and updated to return E#None:F#None when empty '2024-12-2 JM RMW-369 Updated to Add line 2575-2583 Get filter vlaue and return nothing if blank for Rollover CV '2025-7-22 MH RMW-1404 Added the ability to return SAG if used on a U3 cbx '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Public Function GetAllREQListRollover(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) As List(Of String) Try
'========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetAllREQListRO"
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== workflow vars ========================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sCurrScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim iCurrYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sTitleScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim sTitleYear As String = iCurrYear.ToString
Dim lsEntity As New List(Of String) Dim lsFlow As New List(Of String)
Dim scbxEntity As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxEntity").trim If scbxEntity.Split(".")(0) = "" Then scbxEntity = sCube & ".base" 'If scbxEntity.XFContainsIgnoreCase("_General") Then scbxEntity = scbxEntity.Replace("_General",".base") If scbxEntity = "" Then scbxEntity = "ARMY.base"
Dim sCaller As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Caller").trim
Dim scbxScenario As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxScenario").trim If scbxScenario <> "" Then sCube = "ARMY" sCurrScenario = scbxScenario iCurrYear = CInt(scbxScenario.Substring(5,4)) End If
Dim iEntId As Integer = api.Members.GetMemberId(dimtype.Entity.Id, scbxEntity.Split(".")(0))
Dim bEntIsBase As Boolean = Not api.Members.HasChildren(api.Pov.EntityDim.DimPk, iEntId, Nothing)
Dim sFlowMbrFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FlowMbr","Command_Requirements.Base.Where(Name doesnotcontain REQ_00)").trim 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFlowMbrFilter=" & args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("test").trim & " bEntIsBase=" & bEntIsBase & " scbxEntity=" & scbxEntity)
Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ReturnDim").trim Dim sGetSAG As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("GetSAG").trim Dim sTimeOffset As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TimeOffset").trim Dim sTitleSearch As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TitleSearch","")
Dim sScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim iYear As Integer = iCurrYear Select Case True Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 2 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 2 End Select
Dim lsAllREQList As New List( Of String) Dim lsMasterDimList As New List( Of String)
If sFlowMbrFilter= "Top" Then 'lsAllREQList.Add("E#[" & scbxEntity & "]:F#[" & sFlowMbrFilter & "]")
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_CMD_App_Req_Amt_ADM:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args)
Return lsMasterDimList
Else '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim SQL As New Text.StringBuilder SQL.Append("Select CUBE, SCENARIO, TIME, CONS, ENTITY, FLOW From DATAATTACHMENT Where ACCOUNT = 'REQ_Title' And CONS = 'USD' And SCENARIO = '" & sScenario & "' And TIME = '" & iYear.ToString & "'") If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sTitleSearch) Then SQL.Append($" AND TEXT LIKE '%{sTitleSearch}%'") End If 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": SQL: " & SQL.ToString) Dim dtRollFwdReq As DataTable
Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) dtRollFwdReq = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn,SQL.ToString(),True) End Using 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count = {dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count}")
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== build REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim mbrEntityList As List(Of MemberInfo) = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si, "E_ARMY", "E#" & scbxEntity, True)
If dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count > 0 Then For Each drReq As DataRow In dtRollFwdReq.Rows '---- reduce list to only entities within filter ----- For Each MbrInfo In mbrEntityList If Not mbrinfo.Member.Name.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(drReq("Entity")) Then Continue For lsAllREQList.Add($"E#[{drReq("Entity")}]:F#[{drReq("Flow")}]".ToLower)
Next Next End If
'Check if loop output values If lsAllREQList.Count = 0 Then
If sCaller.XFContainsIgnoreCase("REQ_SolutionHelperRollOver") Then Dim lsEmptyList As New List(Of MemberInfo) ' Return lsEmptyList End If
Return lsAllREQList End If
End If
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data based on Filters using General_Member_lists =================================================================== '==================================================================================================================================================
If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sDimDef) Then Return lsAllREQList Else
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_CMD_App_Req_Amt_ADM:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsMasterDimList=" & String.Join(", " , lsMasterDimList))
Dim lsDimMbrs As New List(Of String) For Each x As String In lsAllREQList For Each y As String In lsMasterDimList If y.Contains(x) Then If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#F#") Then lsDimMbrs.Add(y) Else lsDimMbrs.Add(y.Replace($"{x}:","")) End If End If Next Next 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sScenario=" & sScenario & " lsDimMbrs=" & String.Join(", " , lsDimMbrs)) If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then Return lsDimMbrs End If lsDimMbrs = lsDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList()
If sGetSAG.XFContainsIgnoreCase("Yes") Then Dim lsSAG As New List(Of String)
For Each sItem As String In lsDimMbrs
Dim stemp As String = sItem.Split("[")(1) Dim sU3raw As String = stemp.Split("]")(0)
Dim iU3ID As String = BRapi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,dimtype.UD3.Id, sU3raw) Dim sU3Parent As String = BRApi.Finance.Members.GetParents(si, BRApi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si, "U3_APE_PT"),iU3ID, False)(0).Name Dim iU3ParentID As String = BRapi.Finance.Members.GetMemberId(si,dimtype.UD3.Id, sU3Parent) Dim sU3lvl3Parent As String = BRApi.Finance.Members.GetParents(si, BRApi.Finance.Dim.GetDimPk(si, "U3_APE_PT"),iU3ParentID, False)(0).Name
If Not lsSAG.Contains(sU3lvl3Parent) Then lsSAG.Add("U3#" & sU3lvl3Parent) End If Next
Return lsSAG
Else 'brapi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, lsDimMbrs.Item(0)) Return lsDimMbrs End If
End If ' End If Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function #End Region
Public Function GetAllREQListRolloverCBX(ByVal si As SessionInfo, ByVal globals As BRGlobals, ByVal api As FinanceRulesApi, ByVal args As FinanceRulesArgs) Try
'========== debug vars ============================================================================================================ Dim sDebugRuleName As String = "REQ_Member_Lists" Dim sDebugFuncName As String = "GetAllREQListRO"
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== workflow vars ========================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim sCube As String = BRApi.Workflow.Metadata.GetProfile(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ProfileKey).CubeName Dim sCurrScenario As String = ScenarioDimHelper.GetNameFromId(si, si.WorkflowClusterPk.ScenarioKey) Dim iCurrYear As Integer = TimeDimHelper.GetYearFromId(si.WorkflowClusterPk.TimeKey)
Dim sTitleScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim sTitleYear As String = iCurrYear.ToString
Dim lsEntity As New List(Of String) Dim lsFlow As New List(Of String)
Dim scbxEntity As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxEntity").trim If scbxEntity.Split(".")(0) = "" Then scbxEntity = sCube & ".base" 'If scbxEntity.XFContainsIgnoreCase("_General") Then scbxEntity = scbxEntity.Replace("_General",".base") If scbxEntity = "" Then scbxEntity = "ARMY.base"
Dim sCaller As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("Caller").trim
Dim scbxScenario As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("cbxScenario").trim If scbxScenario <> "" Then sCube = "ARMY" sCurrScenario = scbxScenario iCurrYear = CInt(scbxScenario.Substring(5,4)) End If
Dim iEntId As Integer = api.Members.GetMemberId(dimtype.Entity.Id, scbxEntity.Split(".")(0))
Dim bEntIsBase As Boolean = Not api.Members.HasChildren(api.Pov.EntityDim.DimPk, iEntId, Nothing)
Dim sFlowMbrFilter As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("FlowMbr","Command_Requirements.Base.Where(Name doesnotcontain REQ_00)").trim 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sFlowMbrFilter=" & args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("test").trim & " bEntIsBase=" & bEntIsBase & " scbxEntity=" & scbxEntity)
Dim sDimDef As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("ReturnDim").trim Dim sTimeOffset As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TimeOffset").trim Dim sTitleSearch As String = args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFGetValue("TitleSearch","")
Dim sScenario As String = sCurrScenario Dim iYear As Integer = iCurrYear Select Case True Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 2 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Prior") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear - 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear - 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 1).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 1 Case sTimeOffset.XFEqualsIgnoreCase("Next2") sScenario = sCurrScenario.Replace(iCurrYear.ToString, (iCurrYear + 2).ToString) iYear = iCurrYear + 2 End Select
Dim lsAllREQList As New List( Of String) Dim lsMasterDimList As New List( Of String)
If sFlowMbrFilter= "Top" Then 'lsAllREQList.Add("E#[" & scbxEntity & "]:F#[" & sFlowMbrFilter & "]")
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_CMD_App_Req_Amt_ADM:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args)
Dim sRowMbrList As String = String.Join(",",lsMasterDimList) Dim objMemberInfos As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrList , Nothing)
Return objMemberInfos
Else '================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '================================================================================================================================================== Dim SQL As New Text.StringBuilder SQL.Append("Select CUBE, SCENARIO, TIME, CONS, ENTITY, FLOW From DATAATTACHMENT Where ACCOUNT = 'REQ_Title' And CONS = 'USD' And SCENARIO = '" & sScenario & "' And TIME = '" & iYear.ToString & "'") If Not String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sTitleSearch) Then SQL.Append($" AND TEXT LIKE '%{sTitleSearch}%'") End If 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": SQL: " & SQL.ToString) Dim dtRollFwdReq As DataTable
Using dbConn As DbConnInfo = BRApi.Database.CreateApplicationDbConnInfo(si) dtRollFwdReq = BRApi.Database.ExecuteSql(dbConn,SQL.ToString(),True) End Using 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, $"{sDebugRuleName}.{sDebugFuncName}: dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count = {dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count}")
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== build REQ return list ================================================================================================================= '==================================================================================================================================================
Dim mbrEntityList As List(Of MemberInfo) = BRApi.Finance.Metadata.GetMembersUsingFilter(si, "E_ARMY", "E#" & scbxEntity, True)
If dtRollFwdReq.Rows.Count > 0 Then For Each drReq As DataRow In dtRollFwdReq.Rows '---- reduce list to only entities within filter ----- For Each MbrInfo In mbrEntityList If Not mbrinfo.Member.Name.XFEqualsIgnoreCase(drReq("Entity")) Then Continue For lsAllREQList.Add($"E#[{drReq("Entity")}]:F#[{drReq("Flow")}]".ToLower) Next Next End If
'Check if loop output values If lsAllREQList.Count = 0 Then
If sCaller.XFContainsIgnoreCase("REQ_SolutionHelperRollOver") Then Dim lsEmptyList As New List(Of MemberInfo) Return lsEmptyList End If
Dim sRowMbrListAll As String = String.Join(",",lsAllREQList) Dim objMemberInfosAll As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrListAll , Nothing)
Return objMemberInfosAll
End If
End If
'================================================================================================================================================== '========== get REQs that have data based on Filters using General_Member_lists =================================================================== '==================================================================================================================================================
If String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(sDimDef) Then Dim sRowMbrListAll As String = String.Join(",",lsAllREQList) Dim objMemberInfosAll As List(Of MemberInfo) = api.Members.GetMembersUsingFilter(args.MemberListArgs.DimPk, sRowMbrListAll , Nothing)
Return objMemberInfosAll Else
If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#") And sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("F#") Then sDimDef = "E#F#" & sDimDef.Replace("E#","").Replace("F#","") args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", sDimDef) Else args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DimDef", "E#F#" & sDimDef) End If
Dim sDataBufferPOVScript="Cb#ARMY:S#" & sScenario & ":C#Local:V#Periodic:A#REQ_CMD_App_Req_Amt_ADM:I#Top:O#BeforeAdj:U7#None:U8#None" args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("DataBufferPOVScript", sDataBufferPOVScript) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Time", iYear & ", " & iYear+1 & ", " & iYear+2 & ", " & iYear+3 & ", " & iYear+4 ) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Entity", scbxEntity) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("Flow", sFlowMbrFilter) args.MemberListArgs.NameValuePairs.XFSetValue("ReturnList", "True")
lsMasterDimList = BR_GeneralMemberLists.GetFilteredDataRows(si,globals,api,args) 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": lsMasterDimList=" & String.Join(", " , lsMasterDimList))
Dim lsDimMbrs As New List(Of String) For Each x As String In lsAllREQList For Each y As String In lsMasterDimList If y.Contains(x) Then If sDimDef.XFContainsIgnoreCase("E#F#") Then lsDimMbrs.Add(y) Else lsDimMbrs.Add(y.Replace($"{x}:","")) End If End If Next Next 'BRApi.ErrorLog.LogMessage(si, sDebugRuleName & "." & sDebugFuncName & ": sScenario=" & sScenario & " lsDimMbrs=" & String.Join(", " , lsDimMbrs))
If lsDimMbrs.Count = 0 Then Return lsDimMbrs End If lsDimMbrs = lsDimMbrs.Distinct().ToList()
Return lsDimMbrs
End If ' End If Catch ex As Exception Throw ErrorHandler.LogWrite(si, New XFException(si, ex)) End Try End Function
End Class
Public Class REQ Public Property sMbrScript As String Public Property iRank As Integer End Class
End Namespace

adapter.name: Display_DataAttachment_REQ_Status
adapter.sqlQuery: SELECT Account, Text, Count(Text) 'Record Count' FROM [OneStream_ARMY_RMW_Dev].[dbo].[DataAttachment] WHERE Account = 'REQ_Rqmt_Status' AND Text IN('Submitted','Reviewed','Validated','Submitted to Command','Command Validated','Command Prioritized','Ready for Financial Review','Ready for Validation','Ready for Prioritization','Ready for CMD Validation','Ready for CMD Prioritization','CMD Prioritized', 'Returned From Command', 'Returned From CMD') GROUP BY Account, Text ORDER BY Text;

adapter.name: Update_DataAttachment_REQ_Status
adapter.sqlQuery: UPDATE [OneStream_ARMY_RMW_Dev].[dbo].[DataAttachment] SET [Text] = 'Ready for Financial Review' WHERE Account = 'REQ_Rqmt_Status' AND Text = 'Submitted';
